Ago sara na ego samunona awa, ‘Na me memeka sane. Otao mamai naso osai nusokare nana daimata mai awa kaka kora wamu wewa, awa namore kaka wamu wewa ago inoya awa.’
Ago sana nukare gera wai gege gera wai amira nate bayamunora. Ota etutiro nuai meni awa nuai me ewanana amira nate bayamunora.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Yesu nu ge awa dapikarago tomite sero tepo wero bua mai nusore ego senua awa,
“Waiko be eto ganakai amire Betai Daininua amira pura kei awamunoya, awa gosinowa awa. Are be amira ana nukare na Emara Mai ni pasinaira betanise puro emara nana wanera potamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Are be amira ana pris babezinoma ata Yuda emara simai nukare pris bamu zazo Kayafa amira nana aunai sora witiro
Yesu saitiro puro damu ge diwa dagimunua awa.
Ago inoise sewa awa, “Ema bama uzanakai tini kapai gorobare wai azu, pura be amire oko wanekai.” Ago sewa awa.
Yesu meni Betani nate bamuro Simon boya ayare noinu kora wenua amira nana sora ena nena ninoise itinu
bama zo meni nuso nana bamuro ou zamare zuma bamubakere boto omata meni wai amira nigai, awa puro nuso nana gitine zozenu gutenua awa.
Ago wenu bua mai nuso meni giro dumu wero ego sewa awa, “Nena zuma bamure awa nogoro gera inoi?
Ami moni witai tamai ema bogamasare potaikai awa!”
Ago sewa Yesu meni niniro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro bamere zuzu towi? Bama nu namore dumi pupinoi ewanana inoya.
Erama bogamasa nukare nimorekare dai be giti nowera nuamunora. Ata nane meni awa nimorekare dai oko nuai gege nuamunona.
Na be pei-kaka noma betana gowamunowa awa. Are nu bere-bere tama naso simuro sia inoya.
Na me memeka sana niniu. Oziga Ewanana zebu sero susawiai amire tani ewanana namore wetia amira oziga awa dai sero sero awara bayamunoya awa.” Ago senua awa.
Are bua mai nuso 12 nusokare nana zo zazo nuso Yudas Iskeriot nune ami pris babezinomara nana bamuro
ego ine senua awa, “Na Yesu kereniro poti wana nisokarera nana nikare namore moni nazo potamunowi?” Ago atata wenu nukare silva moni 30* azimuwa pumunua awa.
Pumuro Yesu gera potaira ebata tamamu bua wenua awa.
Betai Daininua amira pura kei awenu Yuda ema bama meni yis sienitinoise noiwa amire Yesura bua mai meni nu atata wero sewa awa, “Nakare zeme so nana Betai Daininua amira bona niso sawero sia-masia wanisekare kotupitinosi?”
Ago sewa ina ego senua awa, “Nikare Yerusalem nate bamuro ema zo gita sesena goisewa amire ego tugata wewo gae, ‘Gipai ema nasokai nu nimore ego toya awa: Be naso zora awinoya, are niso nana muro bua mai nasore dai Betai Daininua amira bona namukare tona,’ ago seu gae.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Are Yesu meni ge awa senu bua mai nuso meni dimuro Betai Daininua amira bona sawero sia-masia wewa awa.
Tua zinu Yesu nu bua mai nuso 12 pumunu Yerusalem baro so amira witiro Betai Daininua amira bona niwa awa.
Ninoise Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na me memeka nimorekare sane. Nisokare nana zo meni na kereniro iwora nana wanera potamunoya.”
Ago senu bua mai nuso nukare duba nitinoise da da nu atata wero sewa awa, “Tua, namore tosita?”
Asewa nune ego senua awa, “Namore dai ame sura patamunonato nune ami na kerenamunoya awa.
Na Emara Mai meni ebata namore sero gaewa amira bayamu sero inona awa. Ota ema na kerenamunoya nu awa, oi! ina nuso nogo pumamunoi? Mia nu kaka pumamu wamia, awa nu waya oko tamamia.”
Ago senu Yudas kerenai ema ami da ago nu atata wero senua awa, “Gipai ema, namore tosita?” Ago senu ina ego senua awa, “Tosa awa.” Ago senua awa.
Nukare nena ninoise itiwa Yesu meni porong pumuro Anuture kokopai asero eweweniro bua mai nusore potitinoise ego senua awa, “Pumuro niu. Ei awa pisi naso.”
Ago sero akou ou wainre zo pumuro Anuture kokopai asero numorekare potitinoise ego senua awa, “Nikare dapikarago ami niu.
Ei awa orara naso. Orara ami Anuture tairo nuai amira ge ziai zewai wamunoya. Ema dainiro amira pasina disaise zozamunona.
Sana niniu. Na ou wain zeme ninonakai awa doro kaka namu noma Mama naso imata Tua wai amire nimorekare dai ou wain seka zo namunonakai awa.” Ago senua awa.
Nukare yere zo gamuro eriro Yerusalem doro bamuro dirumu zazo Oliwa amira witiro itiwa awa.
Ebete susawise Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Pi emire nikare dapikarago azu wero na doro bozamunowa. Nera kota, ge gayai zo ego itia awa me wamunoya, Na Anutu meni dia ema dana lama nukare sisamunora awa.
Ata na betaira ena eriro Galilaya zebura bayana nikare ama mamunowa.”
Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Eni bamu awa dapikarago ni azu duara nane ni oko duamunona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana nini. Nine pi emire kokara ge kaka samure na begi wasa be etorobara wamunoya.”
Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Nukare na nimore dai dara betanise samunora, ata saineba, na ni oko begi wamunona.” Ago senu bua mai otao mamai eni meni da ago nu soremuro sewa awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore susaumite ni bua zo zazo Gesemani amira kei awero Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nikare ego arumuro itawa nane ogo bamuro isa samunona.”
Ago sero Petoro ata Zebedira mai eto puro bamuwa awa. Bamuwa Yesu nu duba nitinoise duba mou wenu
numorekare ego senua awa, “Na duba nai bamure nona duba nai meni na puro osesi betanise inoya. Are nikare namore dai ego itise seka zisero uma wewo.”
Ago sero agewara bamuro giti benau nuso poti zebura niro ego toise isa senua awa, “Mama naso, ninasa wai sogo ine wai giro yaya bamu ei awa na dainae. Ata ge naso kota, ge niso meni me waise.”
Isa ago sero mai etorobara nana ewesemuro nukare gitawa inoiwa giro Petorore ego senua awa, “Nikare namore dai aua daimata gege seka zisero itai ine tepo, atonua!
Nikare etetenaira beyata wai azu, seka zisero itise isa seu. Duba nisokare meni bua kokopai waira peu inoya, ata tama meni awa mou inoya.” Ago senua awa.
Are noko baro ge ego toise isa senua awa, “Mama naso, yaya bamu ei awa na dainaise ninasa te kaka wamu wai giro saineba dimuro tepo wana ge niso meni me wae.”
Isa ago sero ewesemuro bua mai nukare giti moweninu gitawara dago itiwa ginua awa.
Giro doro noko bamuro isa senu be etorobara wenua. Ge gita senua da awa toise isa senua awa.
Isa sero tepo wero bua mai nana ewesemuro ego senua awa, “Nikare gitawa gege inoise itewa, atonua! Be kei awetia. Emara Mai kerenera pasina emara nana wanera wititinona.
Kerenai ema tupia. Eriu, nusokare nana bayanekai.”
Ago tuaise bua mai 12 amira otao nusokare Yudas meni iwo dubu bamu gita wenu kei awewa awa. Iwo dubu awa pris babezinoma ata Yuda emara simai ami iyetiwa goroba wamu sero kasiware dobare pumuro puro kei awewa awa.
Gita kerenai ema meni iwo dubu bamure ge zo gipero ego senua awa, “Ema nane saniro imamunona, numa awa. Nu awa saniro pumamunowa.”
Are kei awero eya Yesu nana bamuro, “O gipai ema naso,” ago sero imunua.
Ago wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Otao, bua niso wamu sero mesa awa we tepo wae.” Ago senu nukare muro nu puro wana beniwa awa.
Are Yesure dai noiwa amira nana zo meni kasiwa nuso egira ena zinu kisimunu pris bamura soumai awa damu wero dana nuso kesenua awa.
Ago wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Kasiwa niso egira poti toyae. Zo nu goroba wamunoya ami ina nuso da awa goroba tamamunoya awa.
Ni susu naso itia awa kaka gamu inoise ago inosita? Mama naso isa sana zeme-zemeke angelo 70,000 potai osero na soremamera, ata dotinona.
Ago osero na soremara ge gayai meni eba naso ego ine kei awaise towia ami nogo wero me wamunoi?”
Ago sero ema dubu bamu nu pumamu muwa amire ego senua awa, “Nikare kasiware dobare puro tupewa, awa goroba ema zo puro benamu mago inowa. Be giti awa na nimorekare dai ibu bamura nuawena nikare ana nogoro na kaka pumamu inowewi?
Ota nena ei awa porofete meni ge gaewa awa me wero tepo waise kei awinoya.” Ago senu bua mai nuso nukare dapikarago Yesu doro zanero tepo wewa awa.
Ema Yesu ziro saniwa ami nu puro bamuro pris bamu zazo nuso Kayafa amira nana sora puro witiwa. So amira ena lo ge gipai emare simaire ami auniro itiwa awa.
Yesu puro susauwa Petoro nu asike ena ama ganinoise bezegi-bezegi bamunua awa. Susaumite kei awero pris bamu amira nana goma mokara toinua awa. Toiro pris bamura soumai amira nana soe ego sero arumuro itinua awa, “Yesura ge nogo sara zewai wamunoi, ego itise ninane.”
Are pris babezinoma ata giti kopi dubu nukare te itise ema zo meni Yesure opi sai Yesu gera potiro dara betaise sero opi ge siana-katana wewa awa.
Ago inoise ge opi dainiro sewa kei awenu niniwa mou kaka wamu wenu giro opi ge ewanana zo tamamu sero bua inoise itiwa. Ago inoise itiwa ema eto eriroto ego sewato awa,
“Yesu nu ego sesi ninisenato awa, ‘Nane Anutura ibu bamu ziwero waiko be etorobara gege tepo wai amire noko wana dopamunoya. Na ago wai ine te.’ Ago sesi ninisenato awa.”
Ago sewato pris bamu ami eriro Yesure ego senua awa, “Ni nogoro ge niso torato amira ina kaka samu ge tepo itesi?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ge ina kaka samu tepo dopero itinua awa. Ago wenu pris bamu meni noko atata wero senua awa, “Anutu putoure amira nana benaura ni atata wana se zewai wae. Ni Yuda emara Soyai Ema zazo Kristo, Anutura Mai meta tepo ni?”
Atata wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Aware tosa awa. Ata zo sana niniu. Noma na Emara Mai meni Anutu Putoure amira nana wana mera arumuro itana gamunowa. Na utura berezera tame itana osero muro kei awai gamunowa.”
Ago senu pris bamu ami ge awa nininu waya wenu nu tama woi nuka nuso zinu keenu ema dubu nusore ego senua awa, “Nu Anutu dainamu inoise toya, are nakai nogoro ema eni muro nu gera potarise samunonikai? Nu nutope aware gera potia.
Ge waya awa nitopekare niniro nogo towi?” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa,
“Nu betaira gegenai inoya awa.” Ago sero Yesu nana giti mokara pora pisero nu dero musuna-masuna wewa awa. Ota eni meni awa wana moka meni opowara dero
numore ego sewa awa, “Yei, Soyai Ema Kristo. Ni porofete wero giro se, ema ni doinoya amira zazo aweni?”
Ago inoise noiwa Petoro nu goma mokara nate kakame itinua awa. Itinu soumai bama diri zo meni nuso nana bamuro ego senua awa, “Nine ami Yesu Galilaya ema omire dai nowesa awa.”
Ago senu nune ema itiwa amira nana benaura begi inoise senua awa, “Ni ge tosa awa na kau inona.”
Ago sero eriro goma toyai bera kenara baro itinu noko soumai bama diri zo meni giro ema ago itiwa amire ego senua awa, “ma ei awa Yesu Nasarete natara amire dai nowia.”
Ago senu Petoro meni Anutura nana benaura senu zewai wenu noko begi inoise senua awa, “Na ema owa kaka gamu inowena.”
Ago sero dopinoinu be apunu-kaka tepo wenu ema itiwa ami Petoro nana bamuro ego sewa awa, “Nakare ou ge niso ninitinonakare Galilaya emara ge ine inoya. Ni me dubu nusora zo awa.”
Ago sewa nu noko Anutura nana benaura ge ego senu zewai wenua awa, “Na opi samunona, awa Anutu na dai betamunona. Na ema awa kaka gamu inowena.” Ago tuaise kokara meni ge senua awa.
Are Yesu meni gita ge ego senua, “Kokara ge kaka samure nine na begi wasa be etorobara wamunoya,” ge awa kotumuro kei damu niro di bamu senua awa.
Pina atinu pris babezinomare simaire nukare poti dara niro te aunitinoise Yesu dara betaise sewa zewai wenua awa.
Ago wero sewa Yesura wana eto beniro puro Romara ema tua Pilato amira nana bamuwa awa.
Betaise sewa zewai wenua awa Yudas kerenai ema meni niniro giro nogoro ago weteni asero duba nuso waya wenu moni potiwa awa puro bamuro pris babezinomare simaire potinua awa.
Ago inoise ego senua awa, “Na were-were wero ema pasina tepo awa kerenena pumewa.” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nakare ne wanisekare muro tosi? Awa nena niso gege.”
Ago toise moni eseniwa puro bamuro Anutura ibu bamura apenu witinu nu doro baro mui dube wero betenua awa.
Ago wenu pris babezinoma meni moni silva awa sianiro poti dara niro ego sewa awa, “Moni ei awa dai betaira zuma, are ibu bamura akoura potanakai oko te wamunoya.”
Are nukare moni ami ne wamunonikai asero ina-sa inomite sewa te wenu moni awa puro bamuro au wai emara nana zebu agewa zo zuma gaewa awa. Ema esewa muro betara ana gowara bi diti waise sero zuma gaewa awa.
Are zebu amira zazo “Orara Zuma Gayaira” asewa zewai wenua itewia awa.
Are porofete Yeremiara ge me wenua awa. Ge awa ego awa, Isreli ema nukare zuma nuso silva moni 30* asewa awa.
Ema moni silva 30 ami au wai emara nana zebu zuma gaewa awa. Tua meni namore senua da ago wewa.
Nukare Yesu puro bamuwa ema tua nana benaura dopenu ema tua meni atata wero senua awa, “Ni Yuda emara ema tua ni?” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Iyo, tosa awa.”
Ago senu pris babezinomare simaire meni nu gera potamu toiwa nu ge ina oko senua.
Ago wenu Pilato meni atata wero senua awa, “Nimore ge mou-mau tora awa ninitinosita?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ge ina kaka samu tepo itinu ema tua meni giro di taininua awa.
Betai Daininua amira pura sero ema tua nu Yuda ema zo zazo sasara benai sora ena besero awinoisonua.
Are be amira ana goroba ema waya me waya zo benai sora itinua zazo nuso Barabas.
Are ema dapikarago auniro dopinoiwa Pilato meni atata wero senua awa, “Ema zota zo besanise towi? Na Barabas besanise towita Yesu nu ema tua Kristo asai, nu awa besanise towi?”
Pilato meni nukare Yesu zuzu sero tepo puro bamuro nuso nana potiwa awa kotumuro amire ago senua awa.
Are ema tua nu ge sai zewai wai masi nusora arumuro itinu bama nuso meni ge ego potinu bamunua awa, “Ni ema saramai amira ge osino zo oko sase. Nera kota, na zeme atua wero nu emo yaya bamu tapinomite gena.”
Are pris babezinomare simaire nukare ema bama duba gaero ago sewa awa, “Barabas awa-diro Yesu darise seu.” Ago sewa.
Are ema tua meni noko atata wero senua awa, “Zota zo besanise towi?” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Barabas.”
Ago sewa nu atata wero senua awa, “Agoro Yesu Soyai Ema Kristo asinowa numore nogo wamunoni?” Ago atata wenu beta-be wero arero ego sewa awa, “Nu ni pasinaira betaise.”
Ago sewa Pilato meni noko atata wero senua awa, “Nogoro ago towi? Nu pasina ne wisi?” Ago senu nukare atata amira susu kaka samu inoise arero-worero sewa awa, “Ni pasinaira betaise.”
Ago sewa Pilato meni uzutiro sero zainiro tetere wero giro bogi bamu kei awai azu inoise senu soumai ou puro muwa nu Yuda emara nana benaura wana nuso sewinoise ego senua awa, “Ema saramai ei awa dai betai amira pasina awa naso nana oko itaise. Awa nena nisokare gege.”
Ago senu nukare beta-be wero arinoise sewa awa, “Dai betai nusora pasina awa nakare ata saisibuna nasokare amira nana itaise.” Ago sewa awa.
Are Pilato meni senu Barabas besewa kei awenu nukare Yesu asi wo tata meni wai dirinare ami wezewa awa. Wezinomite dowa amire Pilato meni Yesu ni pasinaira dara betaise sero soldia nana wanera potinua awa.
Roma ema tuara soldia eni meni Yesu puro Roma ema tuara sora witiro sewa soldia dapikarago nuso nana auniwa awa.
Aunitinoise Yesura tama woi dutero soldiara tama woi izai wosuniwa pumunua. Awa ema tuara tama woi wosunago wewa pumunua.
Ago wero asi dirinare puro bubuna wero giti nusora wosuniwa awa. Ago wero bogi zo potiwa wana me meni puro dopenua awa. Ago wero nuso nana zora baro bawa diro nu isipitinoise ego sewa awa, “Waiko koko, Yuda emara ema tua.”
Ago wero pora pisinoise bogi soero pumuro nu gitine dewa awa.
Ago inoise nu isipitinomite soldiara tama woi dutuniro doro tama woi nuso awa noko wosuniwa pumunu ni pasinaira damu sero puro bamuwa awa.
Puro susaumite ebete ena ema zo tamuwa zazo nuso Simon, nu Sairini natara. Nukare nu tamuro awita sewa Yesura ni pasinai soremuro dimunu bamuwa awa.
Susaumite zebu zo zazo Goligata, ge nasokaira “Giti Kopira Wetu,” ago kei awewa.
Kei awero ou wainre ou dokaka yaya nuwenaira amire dai dawero potara naise potiwa niro giro donua awa.
Ago wero nu ni pasinaira dewa awa. Dero amire tama woi nuso itagi wero pumamu sero ozina laki wewa awa. Ago wero amire tama woi nuso kanowero pumuwa awa.
Ago wero nu dia inoise arumuro itiwa awa.
Are gitine ike ena susu nera nu deu amira ge ego ine gaero potiwa itinua awa, “Ei awa Yesu, Yuda emara ema tua.”
Are nukare bewana wai mai eto numore dai ni pasinaira dero zo enibara zo enibara ago potiwa dopewato awa.
Are masi amira erama izima-sauma inoise Yesu isimuro numore ego sewa awa,
“Ae, ibu bamu ziwero waiko be etorobara amire ibu seka wamu sisesa ami tama aiso niso gera waira ena soeyo. Ni Anutura mai me nowesa sia, are ni nitope ni pasinaira ena ose dopase.”
Are pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai emare simaire nukare da ago nu isipitinoise sewa awa,
“Nu gita ema eni soremuro kora inoisia, ata nu nutope soremai ine tepo awa. Nu Isreli emara ema tua nasokai nowita, awa ni pasinaira ena zeme osai nu Soyai Ema nasokai me asamunonakai.
Nune ‘Na Anutura Mai’ asinoise Anutu tuma didinowia, are Anutu meni nu yaba inoise giro nu soero pumaise ganekai.”
Ago sewa pasina ema eto dai nuto Yesu da ago isimuwato awa.
Ago numore inoiwa waiko diti 12 klok wenu mume bamu kei awero zebu te wero itinu 3 klok wenua awa.
Are 3 klok wenua amire Yesu meni arero ego senua awa, “Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani.” Ge nasokaira, “Anutu naso, Anutu naso, ni nogoro na dotinosi?”
Ago senu dopero itiwa amira eni meni niniro ego sewa awa, “Nu Elia zawa toya.”
Ota zo meni niniro eya sumuro baro ewara somisomi zo pumuro wain dokakara patiro utura gaero Yesu meni naise sero potinu witinua awa.
Ago wenu eni meni giro ego sewa awa, “Nima do. Elia meni muro nu dusuniro potai osamunoita, awa ganekai.”
Are Yesu nu noko zawa bamu gatenu ozana tepo wenu betenua awa.
Betenu ibu bamura mo bamu* kimenai awa ike ena zaawero keero eto wenua awa. Duwi bamu sumunu omata babezinoma bebezeniwa.
Ago wenu bi diti be zaumunu ge ema gita betai eni meni seka ziwa awa.
Ago wewa ama Yesu nu nutope gita wero erinu amire nukare diti nusokarera ena eriro Yerusalem nata saramai amira baro ema witai amira nana kei awewa giwa awa.
Soldiara giti kopi ata ema nusore nukare Yesu dia dopewa ami duwire nena enire dai kei awenua awa giro azu wero sewa awa, “Ema ei awa me Anutura Mai awa.”
Bama witai Yesu Galilaya zebura ena ama ganinoise sou wewa ami aike dopero tani awa gosinoise itiwa awa.
Nusokare nana eni awa Maria Madara natera, ata Maria zazo nu Yakoboto Yosefera mia, ata Zebedira mai eto amira mia awa.
Tua zinu tuwe Arimatia natara ema waure zo zazo nuso Yosefe, Yesura ge ninitinoise noisonua, ami kei awero
Pilato nana bamuro Yesura woi pumamu senu nininua awa. Niniro woi pumaise soldiare senu dowa.
Dowa Yosefe meni woi pumuro mo kapawai seka zo iboi-tatana meni ewero
puro bamuro omata so seka wamai bi diti nuka nuso gegenai amira Yesu potiro omata bamu zo dereweninu baro be gazenu doro bamunua awa.
Are bi diti mai bera awa Maria Madala natara nu zazoreto arumuro itiwato awa.
Fraide tuwe wena giti darawa wenu Sarerera be zaawewa be amire pris babezinomare Farisayore nukare poti dara niro Pilato nana bamuwa awa.
Bamuro ego sewa awa, “Ema tua nasokare, nakare ge zo kotupitinonakare, awa sanekare. Opi ema omi nu seka noise ego toisonua awa, ‘Betero waiko be etorobara wai amire seka ziro eramunona.’
Gita nu seka noise nutope Soyai Ema Kristo asasai waya inoisia. Ata zeme meni awa bua mai nuso meni bamuro woi nuso bewana puro tara awero amire, ‘Nu betaira ena eriro seka zia,’ opi ago namorekai sara waya me waya wamunoya. Are nukare ago wai azu ni ge sasa soldia meni baro dia wero baititinuara waiko be etorobara tepo waise.”
Ago sewa Pilato meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Soldia potitinona. Are nikare puro bamuro potiwo uma wero baititinoise itare.”
Ago senu nukare soldiare dai baro omata be gazai awa asi meni diwa. Ago wero asi sona besara itai gamu sero asi osino eto awa ni saora mu meni anewa awa. Ago wero soldia eni bi diti dia warise potiro awewa awa.
Sabat pura tepo wenu Sande pina atitinoinu Maria Madala natara nu zazo nusoreto bi diti gamu sero bamuwato awa.
Susauwato duwi bamu sumunu Tuara angelo zo meni utura ena osero omata musuninu enibara bamunu nu tame arumuro itinua awa.
Benau nuso awa piri-piri ine zasipitinoinua. Ota tama woi nuso iboi-tatana awa kapa me kapawai, poraga ine awa.
Are dia ema nukare giro azu wetu zipenu duro ema bebetenai ine wero itiwa awa.
Are bama eto baro kei awewato angelo meni ego senua awa, “Nito azu oko waweto. Na gosinona: Nito Yesu ni pasinaira dai awa gamu sero tupewato.
Ata nu ego oko itia. Nu gita nimorekare senua da ago wero eria. Nito muuto, masi nuso gaweto.
Giti moka nisoto meni giro amire eya bamuro bua mai nusore ego seuto: Yesu nu betaira ena eriro Galilaya zebura gita susawia. Are nikare baro nu ana gamunowa. Ge aware tona awa.”
Angelo meni ago senu giro nuto bi diti doro eya azu bamuwato. Ata nuto yawa sara bamu dai wero bua mai nusore oziga samuto sumai gege sumuro bamuwato awa.
Susauwato Yesu meni ebete ena nuto tamunua. Tamuro numoreto ego senua awa, “Pina koko.” Ago senu nuto nuso nana zora koiniroto te nuso ziwato awa.
Ago wewato Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nito azu oko waweto. Baro otao mamai naso sawato Galilaya zebura bamuro na gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Bama eto susauwato bi diti dia nusokare nana eni meni eya sumuro baro nate ena pris babezinomare uge inoise nena kei awenua amira uge wero tepo wewa awa.
Ago sewa niniro nukare simaire dai auniro ge sero niniro awero soldiare moni witai potitinoise ego sewa awa,
“Nikare ego seu, ‘Pire gitawa inonakare bua mai nuso meni kei awero woi nuso bewana puro baera.’
Ge awa ema tua meni niniro nimorekare nena zo wai azu oko wawe. Nakare nu uzutiro sanakare ninamunoya.”
Ago sewa soldia meni moni awa pumuro ge sai awa dimuwa awa. Are opi ge awa Yuda emara nana te wenua. Te wero itewia itia.
Bua mai 11 nukare awa Galilaya zebura dirumu zo gita Yesu meni numorekare senua amira witiwa awa.
Witiro numa giro nuso nana baro kokoiniwa awa. Da da meni awa duba saisai wewa awa.
Are Yesu meni nusokare nana zora baro ego toise tugata wenua awa, “Putou bamubamu utura amire zebura amire dapikarago namore potiro tepo wai.
Are nikare zebu sero susawise ema dubu sero ge tugata wawa niniro awiso naso ware. Ago inoise Mama ata Mai ata Ozana amira zazora susupitinoise ge ou guteu pumare.
Ota potai ge sero gipero awinowena awa gipeu dimuro tepo ware. Are sana niniu. Na waiko be giti nimorekare dai nuana zebura be tepo wamunoya awa.”
Yesu Kristo Anutura Mai amira Oziga Ewanana ego ine kei awenua awa.
Porofete zo zazo nuso Yesaya meni bukura ge ei awa gaenu itewia ewa, Ei giu! Na oziga sai ema naso iyetamunona. Nu gita wero ebata niso kora wamunoya.
Nu ware gamu-gamura ena zawa sero arero ego toya awa, “Tuara ebata awa kora weu sonae.”
Yesaya meni ge ago gaenua da ago ine Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema ami ware itise zewai ge sasai ninitinoisowa. Ego toisonua awa, “Nikare duba kapeteniro nuai waya nisokare duawa giro amire na nikare ge ou gutamunona. Ago wawa amire Anutu meni nuai waya nisokare disai tepo wamunoya.” Ago toisonua awa.
Yudaya zebura ema bama ata nata bamu Yerusalem amira ema bama dapikarago ami nuso nana baro pasina nusokare kerenasara nu nukare ou Yodan ena ge ou gutinoisonua awa.
Yohanera mo wo kamel tu puro wai. Ata ipu gei nuso awa wora tata. Nu koware pikare awa ninoisonua.
Yohane meni Anutura ge ego toisonua awa, “Na gita inona, ata na putou tepo. Ota ema zo ama mamunoya amira putou bamubake. Nune na dainai. Na dupuniro sandol nusora asi besai ine te oko inoya.*
Nane ge ou gutai nimorekare potena pupitawa, ata nune Ozana nimorekare potai pumamunowa.” Ago toisonua awa.
Ago inoiwa amire Yesu nata Nasarete Galilaya provinsra itia amira ana munu Yohane meni nu ou Yodan ena ge ou gutenua awa.
Are Yesu oura ena wititinoinu utu zaumunu Ozana meni nuso nana toyamu sero ni guma ine wero osisinoinua awa ginua.
Iri niro gosinoinu ge zo ego ine utura ena osenua awa, “Ni Mai naso. Ni wama naso. Na ni emo yawa sara inona.”
Ge osenu Ozana meni nu uzumunu ware bamunua.
Ware baro waiko be 40 itinu Satan meni nu etetenamu wenua. Yesu abu wora masira noinu angelo meni nu kora wewa.
Ema eni meni Yohane puro benai sora potiwa amire Yesu meni Anutura Oziga Ewanana awa sero sero Galilaya bamunua.
Galilaya baro ego senua awa, “Be kei awetia. Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira be kei awetia. Nikare duba kapeteniro Oziga Ewanana niniwo me wae.”
Ago wero Yesu meni ou ubu Galilaya amira kora-kora nomite Simonto nami nuso Andereare nuto ami moga oura apitinoiwato ginua awa. Nuto wo pumai ema.
Yesu meni numoreto ego senua awa, “Nito muuto, na ama ganaweto. Na nito gipana erama pumai ema waweto.”
Ago senu giro nuto moga nusoto eya doro Yesu ama ganewato awa.
Yesu meni noko pei-kaka kora-kora baro nami eto zazo nusoto Yakoboto Yohanere, nuto Zebedira mai, ami wara itise moga kora inoiwato awa ginua.
Giro zawa senu nuto mama nusoto Zebedi ata ama-zanire wara ago doro Yesure dai bamuwato awa.
Nukare bamu nata Kapaneam niwa. Ago noiwa zanatiaira pura zazo nuso Sabat awa kei awenu giro nu Yuda emara yere ibu amira toiro nukare ge tugata wenua awa.
Nu ge tugata inoinu nukare ge nuso niniro di tainiwa. Awa nera kota, nu gera susu meni ge diro baitinua, awa lo ge gipai ema nusokare gipinoisowa awa doro dainiro putoure senua awa.
Ago gipinoinu ema zo bi meni nuso nana toiro itinua ami yere ibu nusokarera ena kei awenua.
Kei awero ge gunero ego senua awa, “Yesu Nasarete natara ema, ni ne wamu sero nasokare nana tupesi? Ni nakare sisamu sero tupesi, tanita? Na susu niso gosinona. Ni Anutura Mai saramai.”
Ago senua awa, ata Yesu meni bi senero ego senua awa, “Ni ge doro numa doro bamu.”
Ago senu giro bi meni ema awa denu aziapinoinu bi zawa gatinoise nu doro bamunua awa.
Ago wenu ema meni giro di tainiro ge ina-sa inoise atata wero sewa awa, “Awa neni? Nu gipai ge seka zo gipinoiwa. Nu ema putoure ine wero ge sawi nena dapikarago ge nuso dipinowera. Bi dai ge nuso dipinora.”
Ago sewa oziga nuso meni baro Galilaya zebura te wenua.
Yesu bua mai nusore ago wero yere ibu doro Simonto Andereare nana sora toiwa Yakoboto Yohanere numorekare dai toiwato.
Simonra imeti-gagara meni yaya tama mena-manara puro duro itinu giro nukare oziga nuso Yesure sewa awa.
Sewa giro Yesu meni nuso nana baro wana nuso zinu erinu tama mena-mana awa tepo wenu nu nena nusokare sawero potinu niwa awa.
Tua amumuka inoinu nukare erama yayare amire erama bi puro noisowa amire awa puro nuso nana kei awewa.
Ago wewa natara ema bama dapikarago ami toyai bera ina-musa wero toyamu sero wewa.
Yesu meni senu ema bama dainiro yaya eure-taure puro noisowa ami kokopai wewa. Nu bi dainiro tunenu bamuwa. Bi meni nu gosinoiwa, are nu nukare ge sai azu senu nukare ge sai ine tepo wewa.
Pire pina kaka atamure nu eriro so doro so zo erama tepo amira baro isa toinu
Simon ata ema numore dai noisowa ami nu kau wero baro
tamuro ego sewa awa, “Ema bama dapikarago ni kau inora.”
Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Nata babezinoma zorage itera amira dai bayanekai. Ago barokai na Anutura ge numorekare sane. Nera kota, na bua ami emo musena.”
Ago sero nu yere ibu nusokare Galilaya zebura itisowa amira baro Anutura ge tugata inoise bi eni tuninoise noisonua awa.
Yesu tani ago inoinu ema zo boya ayare meni Yesura nana muro ge beina wero bawa diro koiniro ego senua awa, “Ni putou niso itia, are ni na kora wamu wero giro kora wasa ewanana wamunona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni nu emo zo wenu giro nu kora wamu sero wana potiro nu kimuro ego senua awa, “Iyo, na ago wamu kotupitinona. Tama niso kokopai kei awaise.”
Ago tuaise boya aya nuso eya wawa wewa tama nuso ewanana wenua.
Ago wenu Yesu meni nu eya bayaise sero ge zewai numore ego senua awa,
“Tani nimore wetena amira bowi awa ema zore oko sase. Ata ni bamu, tama niso awa prisre gipasa gae. Ago inoise nena Mose meni Anuture potawise senua, awa potasa yaya niso tepo wetia amira susu giro baitamunora.”
Ago senu ema awa so doro bamunua awa. Ata nu ema dainirore ge toise amira oziga awa sena-sana wenua. Are Yesu meni nata zota zora eramara giti mokara bayai ine te kaka wamu wenu giro nu so erama tepo amira baro itasai erama enare-onare wero nuso nana kei awinoisowa awa.
Waiko be eni tepo wenu Yesu meni noko tera bamu Kapaneam ninu ema bama meni Yesu nuso nana baro itinua awa niniwa.
Niniro erama dainiro meni auniro itiwa aunaira zara tepo wenu so be atune dai zara tepo wenua awa. Ago wewa nu Anutura ge numorekare toise itinu
ema eni meni ema zo te-wana amai awa puro muwa awa. Ema zoeto-zoeto ami ema awa dimuro puro muwa.
Ata erama witai itiwa, are nukare Yesura nana zorage bayai ine tepo wenu giro nukare so ena Yesu bage itinua ana be wero ema gogare potiwa osenua.
Ago wewa Yesu meni tuma diai nusokare giro mai yayare amire ego senua awa, “Mai naka, na pasina niso disinona.”
Ago senu Yudara lo ge gipai ema eni ego kotupitinoise itiwa,
“Ema emi Anutu meni wago inoya, atonua! Ema zo meni pasina disai ine tepo awa. Awa Anutura bua gege.”
Ago kotupitinoiwa giro Yesu meni nukare kotupitinoiwa awa enia wero giro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro ago kotupitinowi?
Nakai ema yayare amire, ‘Eri, aita wase,’ tepo ago sanakai nu kaka aita wamu wamunoya, awa nakai me namunonakai. Nera kota, ema bama meni ge nasokai gara opi wamunoya. Ata nakai, ‘Na pasina niso disinona,’ tepo ago samunonakai, awa nakai me oko namunonakai. Nera kota, ema bama meni ge nasokaira me awa gai ine tepo.
Are na pasina disaira putou puro zebura nowena, awa gawise sero na ge ei awa dai numore samunona awa,
Na nimore ego tona: Eri, awai masi gogare niso puro niso nana bayase.”
Ago senu nu eriro awai masi gogare nuso puro emara nana giti mokara so doro bamunua awa. Ago wenu nukare di tainiro Anutu bowi wero ego sewa awa, “Nakai tani ego ine gita kaka gamu.” Ago sewa awa.
Yesu meni so awa doro ou ubura zorage noko bamunu ema bama dapikarago meni nuso nana kei awasara ge tugata inoisonua awa.
Ago inoe so awa doro susaumite ema zo zazo nuso Lewi, nu Alifayora mai, nu ami takis potaira sora arumuro itinu giro numore ego senua awa, “Ni na ama gane.” Ago senu giro nu eriro nu ama ganenua awa.
Yesu meni Lewi nana sora baro arumuro nena ninoise itinu takis pumai ema ata Yudara lo ge dai ema witai ami Yesu ata bua mai nusore dai arumuro itiwa. Ema dainiro ago ami Yesu ama ganinoisowa.
Are Farisayora lo ge gipai ema eni meni Yesu takis pumai ema ata Yudara lo ge dai emare dai nena ninoise itinua, awa giro bua mai nusore ego sewa awa, “Nu nogoro takis pumai emare ge dai emare dai nena ninoi?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni ge awa niniro numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema yaya tepore meni dokta nana oko susawewera. Ata ema yayare meni gege dokta nana susawewera. Na ema nuai nuso saramai asinoya awa zawa samu oko muna. Ata na ema pasina wai ema awa zawa samu muna.” Ago senua awa.
Be amire Yohanera bua mai ata Farisayo nukare ami nena nai sienitinoise itiwa. Are ema eni meni muro Yesu atata wero sewa awa, “Nogoro Yohanera bua mai ata Farisayora bua mai ami nena sienitinora bua mai niso meni nena kaka sienamu inori?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema bama ataira bona inoise itara ema nu bama atamunoya ami numorekare dai nuamunoya be amire nena sienarise sawa ninamunorita? Tepo awa. Nukare ema amire dai nuamunora be amire sienarise sawa oko ninamunora.
Ata ama ema awa iwo meni puro bayara tepo wamunoya be amire nukare nena sienamunora. Da ago ine namore wara amire bua mai naso meni nena sienamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nakai mo toto takaniro gayamu sero mo sibi seka puro mo asora oko gainowenakai. Ago wamunonakai, awa mo seka meni zumai mo aso awa noko keyai toto bamubake wamunoya awa.
Noko, nakai ou wain seka puro meme tata matura oko niginowenakai. Ago wamunonakai, awa ou wain meni dobu wero meme tata ziai keyai ou wainre meme tatare awa zainamunonakai. Nakai ou wain seka puro meme tata sekara niginowenakai.” Ago senua awa.
Sabat pura zore Yesu ata bua mai nusore ebete noise wuit bua zo sepinoise bua mai nuso meni wuit me zisero niwa.
Ago wewa giro Farisayo meni numore ego sewa awa, “Lo ge meni nukare bua zo Sabat pura amire wai azu toya awa inora, gosa.”
Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ina ego senua awa, “Nikare uge zo Dawidi ata ema eni numore dai noisowa amire nukare nena nai tepo, meri betinoise itiwa amira uge awa nikare kaka ninamu meni sago inowa, atonua!
Abayata meni pris bamu wero noisonua be amire Dawidi meni Anutura ibu amira toiro ame Anutura giti mokara potitinoisowa awa ninua. Ame awa nukare osai meni nai ine tepo. Pris meni gege narise sai awa. Ata Dawidi meni ame awa puro dubu nusore potinu niwa Anutu meni ginu waya oko wenua.”
Ago sero susumuro ego senua awa, “Anutu meni Sabat pura ami erama sogawaise potinua. Ata erama meni Sabat pura awa sogawarise oko potinua.
Are na Emara Mai meni nena dapikaragora Tua wero nowena ami Sabat pura amira Tua dai wero nowena.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni yere ibura noko toiro ema zo wana amai ami ago itinu tamunua.
Erama ago itiwa ami Yesu ua inoise, “Nu ema yayare awa Sabat pura be emire kora wamunoita?” asero itiwa. Nukare awa Yesu gera potamu sero kotupitinoiwa,
are Yesu meni ema wana amai amire ego senua awa, “Ego mu.”
Ago sero nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai tani ewanana Sabat purare wanakai te wamunoita, tani waya wanakai te wamunoi? Ota nakai erama soremanakai kokopai wara te wamunoita, ema sisanakai betara te wamunoi?” Ago senua, ata nukare usero itiwa.
Are nu gina-gana wero tini kapenu duba waya nusokare giro duba nuso Farisayo emo di toinu emare ego senua awa, “Wana zuzuti.” Ago senu wana zuzutinu wana ewanana noko wenua.
Farisayo meni ibu doro eya baro Herodera Pati memba enie dai auniro Yesu dara betaise amira ebata tamamu sero wewa awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore bamu ou ubura niwa awa. Galilaya ema bama witai-bake meni numore dai bamuwa. Ago wewa ema Yudaya zebura amire
ema nata Yerusalem amire ema Idumia zebura amire ema ou Yodan enibara amire ema nata Tayato Saidonre ami bua dapikarago Yesu meni inoisonua amira ge niniwa, are nukare witai ami nuso nana muwa.
Ago wewa nu bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Ema bama na patamera, wa sia wero zorage potiu itae.”
Ago senua, nera kota, gita nu ema yayare dainiro awa kora wenu giro ema bama yayare dapikarago ami nu kimamu sero ina-musa inoise itiwa.
Are ema bama bi nusokare nana itiwa ami nu giro te nusora duro zawa gatinoise ego toisowa awa, “Ni Anutura Mai.”
Ago sasara Yesu meni ge zewai-zawai bire toise nukare susu nuso ema enire kerenai azu toisonua.
Yesu meni dirumura witiro ema eni yaba wero zawa senu nuso nana muwa
nu nukare siana-katana wero ema 12 pumuro buara potiro nukare numore dai nuarise senua. Nu nukare iyetai Anutura ge sarise,
o bi tunaira putou awa pumarise senua awa.
Nu bua mai 12 sianiro pumunua amira zazo nusokare ewa: Nu zazo seka Simonre potiro Petoro asenua awa.
Yakobo nu Zebedira mai amireto nami nuso Yohanere amira zazo seka Boanege asenua awa. (Ge nasokaira, “Tararara mai.”)
Anderea, Filip, Batolomiu, Matiu, Tomas, Yakobo nu Alifayora mai, Tadias, Simon Zelote,
Yudas Iskeriot nu Yesu kereniro iwora wanera potai ema. Yesu meni bua mai awa buara potiro nu bamu nuso nana ninua awa.
Ema bama dainiro meni noko Yesu nana muwa nu ata bua mai nuso nukare nena nai ine tepo noiwa.
Are dubu nuso meni ge awa niniro, “Nu dau wago inoya,” asero nu soyamu bamuwa awa.
Yudara lo ge gipai ema eni meni Yerusalem ena osero muro ego toise itiwa awa, “Bi zazo nuso Bielsebul ami nuso nana toiro itia. Are bira giti kopi ami nu soremawi bi tuninowia.” Ago sewa awa.
Are Yesu meni ema zawa senu muwa ge bezai eni numorekare ego senua awa, “Satan meni nogo nogo wero nutope tunamunoi?
Nata da amira erama meni awiniro ina-da wamunora, awa nata awa zewai oko itamunoya.
Ota dubu zo awiniro ge ina-sa inoise iwo ina-wa wamunora, awa dubu awa zewai oko itamunora.
Satan meni nutope iwo nuso wero putou nuso zaumuro nuamia, awa nu zewai itai te oko wamia. Putou nuso tepo wamia.
Nakai ema putou bamure zo amira wau dapikarago pumamu sero gita ema awa beniro amire so nusora toiro wau nuso dapikarago pumamunonakai awa.
Na me memeka sana niniu. Eramara pasina dapikarago ata Anutu isimai ge nusokare awa disai te inoya.
Ata zo nu Ozana isimamunoya ema amira pasina disai ine tepo awa. Pasina nuso itai gege itamunoya.”
Yesu ago senua. Awa nera kota, nukare numore ego sewa awa, “Bi meni nuso nana toiro itia.”
Mia nuso ata namisini nuso nukare muro so atune dopero ge numore potiro nusokare nana maise sewa.
Are ema diti bamu meni Yesura nana zorage arumuro itiwa ami numore ego sewa awa, “Mia niso ata namisini niso ami ni gamu sero muro atune dopero itera.”
Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Mia naso ata namisini naso awa arekare ni?”
Ago sero nu ema bama nuso nana zorage arumuro itiwa awa gina-gana wero ego senua awa, “Ema bama emi miamai naso ata namisini naso inora.
Ema bama Anutura ge niniro dipinowera ami nami naso ata nubama naso ata mia naso inora.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu ou ubura noko baro ge tugata inoinu ema bama dainiro-bake ami nuso nana kei awewa. Are nu wa isero witiro arumuro itinu ema diti bamu meni kora itiwa.
Ago itiwa nu numorekare ge bezai eni toise nena witai numorekare tugata inoinua. Tugata inoise numorekare ego senua awa,
“Sana niniu. Ema zo meni nena we buye apamu sero bamunua awa.
Bamuro nena we apitinoinu we eni ebete ena duuwa ni mamai meni tamuro niro tepo wewa awa.
Ota we eni meni awa zebu omata tame kara-kara wai amira duuwa awa. Zebu awa tumou tepo, are we ami eya eriwa awa.
Ago wero tatawi nusokare iboboi tepo, are waiko meni witiro moenu binero betewa tepo wenua awa.
Ota we eni meni awa zebu iwera tatawi itiwa amira duuwa awa. We awa iwere dai dapikarago te tetemo eriro iwe meni nena awa denu me kaka ziamu wenua awa.
Ota we eni meni awa zebu me gawire amira duro eriro zamuro me saisai ziwa awa. We zora me 30 zinu, we zora me 60 zinu, we zora me 100 zinua.”
Ago sero senua awa, “Zo nu danare meni ge ei awa ninaise.” Ago senua awa.
Ema bama bozewa amire ema eni meni Yesure dai noisowa ata bua mai nuso 12 ami ge bezaira susu gamu sero nu atata wewa.
Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira ge bezero itewia, amira susu awa nikare ninawise sai itia awa. Ata eni bamu awa ge bezaira uge gege ninarise sero towena.
Porofete Yesaya meni ge ego gaenua awa, Nukare duba kapeteniro nuai sekara nuara na Anutu meni pasina nusokare disamena, nukare giti moka nusokare meni garise, ata oko giro baitarise. Nukare uge ninarise, ata ugera susu oko niniro baitarise. Anutu meni ago senua, are na ge bezai gege numorekare towena.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ago sero numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare ge bezai amira susu awa kaka gamu inowita? Are nikare nogo wero ge bezai eni amira susu giro baitamunowi?
Susu nuso ego ewa: Ema we uramu apitinoya ami Oziga Ewanana amira ge we urinoya.
Ata ema enira duba awa ebatara zebu zewai ine. Nukare Oziga Ewanana ninitinuawera Satan meni eya muro Oziga Ewanana dana nusokarera toitinowia awa soinowia.
Da ago ine ema eni nukare zebu omata tame kara-kara wai ago ine awa. Nukare utura ge niniro eya pumuro yawa sara inora.
Ata nukare tatawi tepo. Nukare Tuara ebata awa be pei-kaka gege ama ganero noma amire waya nusokare nana kei awawi erama meni utura ge emo iwo numorekare wawera giro nukare eya ebata awa dotinowera.
Ema eni nukare zebu iwere ine. Nukare ami utura ge ninitinora,
ata nukare zebura nena emo kotumu-katumu inoise wau moni emo yawa sara inoise nena eure-taure amira duba-duba inoise nowera, are tani ago ami utura ge gogowara me oko kei awamunoya.
Ata ema eni meni awa zebu me gawire ine. Nukare ami utura ge niniro poti dube niro me zizinora — eni 30, eni 60, eni 100.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai lam gaero puro au sose piero potitinowenikaita? Tepo awa. Ota nakai lam awa so atune potitinowenikaita? Tepo awa. Nakai lam gabarira kimenitinowenakai.
Nena bezai dapikarago ama kei damu namunora. Nena gogowai dapikarago ama kei damu namunora.
Zo nu danare meni ge ei awa ninaise.” Ago senua awa.
Nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ge ninitinowa awa niniro baitiu. Nikare nena eramare potamunowa te Anutu meni nimorekare potamunoya. Nena amire nena enire ewesemamunoya.
Anutu meni ema zo ge me eni puro nowia amire ge me bamubake potamunoya. Ota ema zo ge me pei-kaka gege puro nowia amira ge me awa Anutu meni soero pumamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa ego ine itia: Ema zo meni nena we bua nusora urinowia.
Nena we urero nu awiyo-ditiyo awinoma we meni eritinuawi ema meni we eraira susu kaka giro baitamu.
Zebu meni nu nutope gawi nenare potitinowia. Gita pogi kei awinowia amire me zizinowia. Ago wero amire me pisisinowia awa.
Pisero izawi amire ema ami naira be kei awetia asero ema eni kasiwa orosowaire nena pumarise sero buye potitinowia.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa nogo ine asamunonikai? Nakai susu awa kerenamu sero ge bezai nogo ine sanakai te wamunoi?
Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa ni zo zazo mastet asinowenakai amira me ine awa. Ema meni me awa buye urinowera be amire me awa zebura ni me dapikarago itera amira osai nusokare awa.
Ata urawera eriro ni pei-mamai zepa da gege itai awa dainiro bamu inowia. Ago wawi bona nuso babezinoma kei awawera ni mamai meni duga nusora muro bonara zau potitinowera.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ge bezai saisai toise Oziga Ewanana eramare toisonua awa. Ninai nusokarera te toisonua.
Nu ge bezai gege numorekare toisonua. Ata bua mai nuso imata numore dai itasara be amire nu gera susu numorekare kerenitinoisonua awa.
Be amire tua zinu Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nakai ou ubu semuro enibara bayanekai.”
Ago senu giro nukare ema bama diti bamu awa doro Yesu wara dago itinu giro nu puro bamuwa. Wa eni numorekare dai bamuwa.
Susauwa bisi pena-pana kei awenu kakawa meni wa kukunamu sero inoinua.
Ota Yesu meni awa wa awene baro giti guta waira duro gitawa inoinua. Are nukare nu awa-uzero numore ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, nakai betai sogo inonakai ami emo kotupitinosita?”
Ago sewa nu eriro bisi senero kakaware ego senua awa, “Ni tepo we. Bisi dero iti.” Ago senu so bisi binono denu
nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro wama bazizinoi? Nikare tuma diai tepo ni?”
Ago senu nukare mamaniro ina-sa wewa awa, “Ema ei awa neni? Bisire oure dai ge nuso dipinora.” Ago sewa awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore nukare ou ubu semuro enibara kei awewa. Zebu awa Gerasa emara zebu.
Yesu wara ena witinu ema zo bi nuso nana toiro itisonua ami bi ditira ena muro Yesu nana kei awenua.
Ema awa bi ditira omata sora noisonua. Ema zo nu benai te wai ine tepo awa. Asi zewai zazo sen awa dai te kaka wamu.
Gita ema meni te-wana nuso sen meni benitinoisowa, ata nu wanera sen ziasai kapinoisonua, ota tera sen awa dasai kapinoisonua awa. Ema zo nu saniro patai te oko inoisonua.
Pi sero waiko sero nu bi ditira noise dirumura noise arinoise nutope omata meni kapinoisonua.
Nu ami aikera ena itimite Yesu giro sumuro muro Yesura nana ena duro koiniro
zawa gatero ego senua awa, “Yesu, ni Anutu ike itewia amira Mai, ami namore ne wamu tupesi? Na Anutura giti mokara toise ni na oko dasise tona.”
Ema ago senua, nera kota, Yesu numore emoko ego senua awa, “Bi, ni ema ewa doro bamu.”
Yesu meni nu atata wero senua awa, “Zazo ni aweni?” Ago senu ina ego senua awa, “Zazo naso Diti Bamu. Nera kota, nakare witai-bake.”
Ago sero ge beina-baina wero Yesure begomo senua awa, “Bi esenasa aike oko bayare.”
Are nata pu saisai dirumu demabera nena kau inoise itiwa giro
bi meni Yesure begomo sero ego sewa awa, “Nakare esenasa pura nana toyanekare.”
Ago sewa giro Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ago weu.” Ago senu bi meni emara nana ena kei awero doro pura nana toiwa pu meni sumuro degara baro ou ubura dagimuro ou niro betewa awa. Pu amira namba nusokare awa 2,000.
Pu dia wai ema ami bozero baro ema nate itiwa amire sero ema wo bowe itiwa amire sewa giro nukare tani kei awenua awa gamu sero muwa.
Nukare Yesu nana muro ema gita bi saisai nuso nana itiwa ami mo awero kotumai kokopai puro arumuro itinua awa giro azu wewa.
Ema eni tani emara nana kei awenu giwa ami ge tugata wewa. Ota tani pure kei awenua amira uge dai tugata wewa.
Ago wewa erama meni Yesure begomo sero zebu nusokare doro bayaise sewa awa.
Yesu wara wititinoinu ema gita bi nuso nana itiwa ami Yesure begomo sero numore dai nuamu senua.
Ata Yesu meni “Tepo” asero numore ego senua awa, “Dubu nisora nana baro Tua meni ni awa-diro tani kokopai nimore wetia awa se gare.”
Ago senu nu baro zebu zazo Dekapolis (ge nasokaira, “Nata wana eto”) amira kei awero tani Yesu meni numore wenua amira ge tugata-magata wasai erama dapikarago be anero ge nuso gege ninitinoisowa awa.
Yesu wara witiro ou ubu noko semuro enibara kei awero kora itinu erama dainiro meni nuso nana kei awewa.
Kei awero itiwa yere ibu simai ema zo zazo nuso Yairo ami Yesu giro nuso nana baro koiniro
ge beina wero begomo sero ego senua awa, “Mai bama diri naso kiaka ami betamu sero inoya. Ni mu. Ni mai kora wamu sero giro wana niso nuso nana tame potasa nu kokopai wero nuamunoya, awa gosinona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore dai bamunua. Susaunu erama dainiro meni numore dai noise nu soe potiro puro susauwa.
Are bama zo numorekare dai susaunua ami inua giro noe donu zepa 12 tepo wenu inua gaira orara nuso kaka touwamu.
Nu gita dokta saisai amira nana bayasai nukare bua wasara te kaka wamu wasai nu yaya bamubake tapinoisonua awa. Nu wau moni nuso dapikarago potinu tepo wenua, ata yaya kaka tepo wamu. Yaya bamubake kei awinoisonua.
Are nu ami Yesura oziga niniro erama diti bamu amira nana gate-gate wero Yesu nana atune kei awero
nutope ego kotumunua awa, “Na tama woi nuso kimuro ewanana wamunona.”
Ago kotumuro kei awero Yesura mo kimunu orara nuso eya touwenu Yesu meni nu kora wenu yaya tepo wenua awa ginua.
Ago wenu Yesu meni kora waira putou eni nuso nana ena bamunua awa enia wero erama diti bamu amira nana soe ena eya kapeteniro ego senua awa, “Agai tama woi naso kimi?”
Ago senu bua mai nuso meni numore ego sewa awa, “Erama diti bamu meni ni musinora, ata ni ‘agai na kimi?’ asero atata inosua.”
Ago sewa ata Yesu meni, “Ai meni na kimi?” asero gamu sero gina-gana wenua.
Ata bama ami tani Yesu meni numore wenua awa giro azu wero boro-boro inoise Yesu nana muro te nusora duro susu nuso kereniro numore senua awa.
Ago wenu giro Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Mia naka, ni tuma diai nisora ewanana wetesa. Are ni yawa sara inoise bamuyo. Yaya niso oko ewesemamunoya.”
Yesu meni ago toise itinu ema eni meni simai emara nana sora ena muro ego sewa awa, “Mai bama diri niso betetia. Ni nogoro bua bamu gipai emare potamu tosi?”
Ago sewa, ata Yesu meni ge toiwa awa ninidanago wero yere ibu simai emare ego senua awa, “Kotumu-katumu oko wase. Tuma diaire gege noiyo.”
Ago sero nukare dapikarago numore dai bayai azu sero Petoro ata Yakoboto nami nuso Yohanere ami gege numore dai bayarise senua.
Nukare baro yere ibu simaira sora kei awero Yesu meni erama saisai pasi inoise itiwa awa ginua. Ema bama di toise dibe inoise itiwa.
Ago inoiwa giro Yesu sora toiro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro pasi inoise di towi? Mai awa kaka betamu. Nu gitawa inoya.”
Ago senu nukare nu sero ziwa. Ata nu nukare eseninu so doro bamuwa nu maira mamato miere ata ema numore dai itiwa awa puro masi mai itinua amira toinua.
Toiro maira wana ziro numore Yuda gera ego senua awa, “Talita kumi.” Ge amira susu ego ewa: “Mai kiaka, erasise tona.”
Ago senu mai meni eya eriro aita wenua. Zepa nuso 12. Erama meni eya di tainiro yaka asewa.
Yesu meni nukare susu awa ema enire sai azu ge zewai senua. Ago sero nukare nena nai maire potarise senua awa.
Yesu meni nata awa doro nata nusora bamunua. Bua mai nuso meni numore dai bamuwa.
Are Sabat pura kei awenu giro nu yere ibu du toiro ge tugata inoinu ema bama saisai meni ge nuso niniro di tainiro ego sewa awa, “Ema awa kotumai awa nana ena tapitai? Kotumai zewaine nuso nana kei awitai? Nu nogo wero tani erama gita kaka gamu awa inowi?
Ema ewa nu kapenda. Nu Mariara mai awa. Nu Yakobora Yosefera Yudara Simonra nami. Nubabumana nuso namorekai dai nowera.” Ago sero nukare Yesure kotumai waya pumuro duba mou wewa.
Ata Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Porofete nukare ema zazore. Ata nata nusokarera ena, o dubu nusokarera nana ena, o mama nusokarera nana ena, awa nukare ema zazore tepo.” Ago senua awa.
Nu tani erama gita kaka gamu awa nusokare nana ena wai ine te kaka wamu wenua. Ata nu wana nuso meni ema yayare da da amira nana potinu yaya nusokare tepo wenua awa.
“Nukare nogoro na tuma kaka diamu inori?” ago kotumuro nu aita wero nata kikinakara baro ge tugata wenua awa.
Yesu meni bua mai 12 zawa senu muwa bi tunaira putou awa numorekare potiro nukare eto-eto baro teya-taya warise sero nu numorekare ego senua awa,
“Ebatara nena zo oko pumawe. Wo ma tepo, kaita tepo, wau moni tepo. Ketu gege pumuwo.
Te mokara sandol wosunamunowa, ata tama woi eto oko wosunawe.
Nikare esewa wero nata zora baro so da amira toiro itise muro baro awinoma nata awa duamu sero amire so awa dowo.
Nata zo meni nikare sawa kaka diamu, o ge nisokare kaka ninamu wara giro nata awa doro susu nusokare garise sero zebu nusokare te moka nisokarera itia awa deregi weu osae.”
Ago senu giro bua mai 12 ami baro eramare ego sewa awa, “Nikare duba kapeteniu.”
Ago sero sero bi saisai tunero gawi eni ema yayare saisai amira nana zozasara yaya nusokare tepo inoisonua awa.
Yesura oziga baro ema bama dapikarago zebu sero amira te wenua. Ago wenu ema tua zo zazo nuso Herode ami Yesura oziga nininua. Ema eni meni Yesure ego toisowa awa, “Nu Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema. Nune ami betaira ena erinua, are nu tani putoure inowia.”
Eni meni ago toisowa, ata eni meni ego toisowa awa, “Nu Elia.” Ota eni meni ego toisowa awa, “Nu porofete zo. Porofete gita noisowa ago ine.” Ago toisowa awa.
Ata Herode meni Yesura tani amira ge niniro ego senua awa, “Na ge sesena nukare Yohanera duba kapetera giti osisia, ata nu noko eriro noya.”
Herode meni ago senua, nera kota, gita nu soldia senu baro Yohane beniro puro poti benai sora niwa. Herode meni tani awa Herodia emo wenua, amira susu ego ewa: Herode meni nami nuso Filipra bama puro atinua awa. Bama amira zazo Herodia.
Ago wenu giro Yohane meni Herodere ego senua awa, “Ni nami nisora bama amire nowesa, awa te oko inoya. Lo ge itia.”
Yohane meni ago senu giro Herodia meni dumu wero Herode nu Yohane daise toisonua.
Ata Herode meni tani awa kaka wamu. Nera kota, nu Yohane emo azu inoisonua. Herode meni Yohane nu ema saramai, nu ema pasina kaka wamu, awa giro azu wero soinoisonua awa. Yohane nu ge sasai Herode meni niniro itazaita wero kotumu-katumu inoisonua, ata nu Yohanera ge ninamu yaba inoisonua awa.
Ata Herodia meni Yohane dai betaira be awa tamunua. Herode meni mia nu pumunua amira be awa kei awenu giro nu ema babezinoma nuso ata soldiara giti kopi eni ata Galilaya zebura ema babezinoma eni ami emo ana-bona wenua.
Be amire Herodia meni Yohane dai betaira ebata tamunua. Awa ego ewa: Mai bama diri nuso meni Herodera ibura toiro yawa bamubake wienu Herode ata esewa numore dai itiwa ami giro yawa sara wewa. Ago wero giro Herode meni mai kanoware ego senua awa, “Ni nena zota zo yaba wero sasa giro potamunona.
Na Anutura giti mokara sana zewai wae. Ni nena zota zo emo sasa giro potamunona awa. Zebu naso agewa emo samunosa, awa potamunona.”
Ago senu nu so doro baro mia nusore ego senua awa, “Na ne potaise samunoni?” Ago senu mia nuso meni ego senua awa, “Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema amira giti nimore potaise samunosa.”
Ago senu nu eya sumuro Herode nana baro ego senua awa, “Zeme-zemeke ni Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema amira giti tewara potiro potasa pumane.”
Ago senu Herode meni kotumunu te kaka wamu wenu duba mou wenua. Ata nu Anutura nana giti mokara ge senu zewai wenua, noko ema dai itiwa amira nana ge nuso osago wai azu,
nu soldia zo meni Yohanera giti kapero puro maise senu baro benai sora ena duba nuso kapero
giti tewara potiro puro baro mai bama dirire potinu puro mia nusore potinua awa.
Ago wewa Yohanera bua mai meni tani amira oziga niniro giro baro woi nuso pumuro puro baro bi ditira potiwa awa.
Ema Yesu meni iyetinua ami Yesu nana ena auniro ge tugata inoise bua wewa awa dapikarago numore sewa awa.
Ota erama saisai Yesu nana muro baro awinoiwa Yesu ata bua mai nusore nena naira be tepo wenua. Ago wenu giro Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Mukai. Nakai imata baro so erama tepora ena zanatianekai.”
Ago sero nukare wara witiro so erama tepo amira bayamu susauwa
erama saisai nata serora ami nukare susauwa giro kora-kora ama ganero bamuwa awa.
Yesu wa doro witi ete niro ema diti bamubake awa giro nukare emo zo amunua. Nera kota, nukare pu mamai meni mia kau inoise nowera ago ine. Ago giro zo amuro nu nukare ge tugata-magata inoinu
tua zizinoinu giro bua mai nuso meni nuso nana zorage muro numore ego sewa awa, “So ewa so waya. Nena nai tepo. Tua zizinoya,
are ni ema bama duasa baro nena nai nusokare pumamu nata zora-zara itera amira bayare.”
Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Ninekare nena nai potiu nare.” Ago senu nukare numore ego sewa awa, “Nakare baro ame moyai 200 kina meni zuma gaero numorekare potanakare narise tosa?”
Ago sewa nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ame moyai nikare nazo ni? Bamuu, gawe.” Ago senu nukare baro giro noko muro ego sewa awa, “Ame wana dare wo etore gege itera.”
Ago sewa nu eramare ego senua awa, “Nikare dubu sero dopero gras uwiwai tame arumuu.”
Ago senu nukare dubu sero arumuwa; dubu eni erama 100, dubu eni erama 50, ago wero arumuwa awa.
Yesu meni ame wana dare wo etore puro iri utura niro Anuture kokopai asero ame awa eweweniro bua maire potinua awa. Awa bua mai meni eramare potarise sero ago wenua awa. Nu wo eto puro totoumuro kanowenu erama dapikarago ami pumuwa.
Nukare dapikarago niwa te wenua awa.
Ago wero nukare ame itatare wo itatare dara potiwa kana 12 te wenua.
Ema nena niwa amira namba nusokare awa 5,000.
Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nikare wara witiro ziriniro enibara Besaida nate gita bayamunowa. Na ema bama bozarise sero duamunona.”
Ago sero nu nukare gita iyetinu bamuwa nu isa samu sero dirumura witinua awa.
Are tua zinu wa ou ubu soe tiara noinu Yesu imata ete itinua.
Ago itimite bisi meni nukare dero pumunu nukare wa dawaira yaya tapinoiwa awa ginua. Ago giro pina atamu inoinu amire nu ou ubu tame aita wero nusokare nana bayamu sero bamunua. Nu nukare dainamu sero inoinu
nukare nu ou tame aita inoinua awa giro nu ititi zota asero zawa gatewa.
Nukare zawa gatewa. Awa nera kota, nukare nu giro azu wero wetu wana zipewa. Ago wewa giro nu numorekare eya ego senua awa, “Nikare zewai wewo. Nama awa. Azu oko wawe.”
Ago sero nu wara witinu so bisi denua. Ago wenu nukare yaka asewa.
Nera kota, nukare tani Yesu meni ame eramare potinua amira susu kaka gamu. Giti munu nusokare omata me omata ine.
Nukare ou ubu semuro bamu zebu zazo Genesaret amira niro wa isewa witinua awa.
Ago wero wa doro witiwa erama Yesu gai ami nu giro
nata zora-zora itiwa amira sumuro ema bama keziawewenai goga gaero zuaniro, Yesu ago itia, asero ago potiwa awa.
So dapikarago Yesu meni bamunua — nata kikinaka, o nata babezinoma, o so nata tepo — so amira erama meni ema bama keziawewenai puro ebete potiwa ema bama yayare meni Yesu begomo sero mo be nuso gege kimamu sewa. Ema bama kimuwa amira yaya tepo wenua awa.
Farisayo eni ata lo ge gipai ema eni Yerusalem ena muwa ami Yesu nana auniwa.
Auniro bua mai nuso meni wana saramai tepo, wana kaka sewamu nena ninoiwa awa giwa.
Wana sewaira tani* amira susu ego ewa. Yuda ema dapikarago, Farisayo dai, nukare nena tepo oko ninowera. Nukare ewowo nusokarera sienai ama ganero wana sewero amire nena ninowera awa.
Nukare maketra ena ewesemuro gita ou gutero amire ama nena ninowera. Nukare ewowora sienai eure-taure inoise akoure teware aure sewinowera.
Are Farisayo ata lo ge gipai ema ami Yesu atata wero sewa awa, “Bua mai niso meni nogoro ewowora sienai awa doro noweri?”
Ago sewa nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare opi ema me sao inowewa. Porofete Yesaya meni ge gaenua ami nikare pupinoya. Ge gaenua awa ego ewa, Tua meni ego toya: Erama emi na begiti meni bowi inowera, ata moka nusokare naso nana oko itia.
Nukare emara ge awa Anutura lo ge ine asero sero gipero awinowera. Are nukare na bowi wero zainitinowera. Yesaya meni ago gaenua awa.”
Yesu meni ago sero amire ge susumuro ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutura lo ge doro eramara wini ge puro ziro baititinowewa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ge zo noko numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutura lo ge apero doro ewowora tani ama ganero nowewa, awa kotumuro kokopai asinowewa, atonua!
Na ago tona, nera kota, Mose meni ego senua awa, Ni tani kokopai mia mama nisore inoise noiyo. Noko, Zo nu mia mama nusore ge waya samunoya, nu awa deu betae.
Mose meni ago senua, ata nikare ego towewa awa: Zo nu mia mama nusore ego sai te wamunoya awa, ‘Na nena nimoreto potamena, ata na nena awa Koban asena.’ (Koban amira susu ego ewa: “Na nena awa Anuture potamu sena zewai wenua.”)
Mai zo ago samunoya, awa nikare nu mia mama soremai azu towewa.
Ago wero nikare Anutura lo ge poti ama niro ewowora tani poti gita niro maire gipinowewa. Tani saisai ago ine inowewa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ago sero ema bama noko zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Ge sana niniu. Nikare dapikarago niniro baitiu.
Nena be nisokarera toitinowia ami oko nikare wawi bemitire inowewa. Ge be nisokarera ena kei awinowia ami nikare wawi bemitire inowewa awa. [
Zo nu danare meni ge awa ninaise.]” Ago senua awa.
Ago sero ema bama doro bua maire dai sora toiro bua mai meni ge bezaira susu gamu sero nu atata wewa awa.
Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Agoro nikare dai kaka gamu inowewita? Nikare susu ei awa gosinowita? Nena nai meni bera toiro nikare oko wawi bemitire inowewa.
Nera kota, nena nai ami duba nisokarera oko toitinowia. Nena awa tini nisokarera bamuro eba nusora osisinowia.” Yesu meni ge awa toise nena nai dapikarago siro beto wenua.
Ago sero amire ego senua awa, “Tani emara nana dubara ena kei awinowia ami ema awa wawi bemitire inowia.
Nera kota, emara nana mokara ena, o emara dubara ena kotumai waya meni kei awinowera — kuma wai, bewana wai, mai dai betai, soa patai,
duba-duba wai, tani waya wai, opi sai, gai waya wai, wiza atata wai, tama puro witai, wini ge dero nuai —
tani awa dapikarago emara nana mokara ena kei awero ema awa wawi bemitire inowia.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ana eriro bamu zebu zo nata zazo Taya itisonua amira niro so zora toiro itise ema bama nu ago itinua awa gai azu senua, ata nu nutope begi wai ine tepo.
Ago inoinu bama zo meni Yesura oziga nininua. Bama amira mai bama diri kiaka ami bi nuso nana itinua awa. Bama ami kei awe Yesu nana niro koininua.
Ota bama awa nu Yudako. Zebu nusora zazo Sirofonisia. Are nu Yesure begomo sero nu mai nusora bi tunaise senu
Yesu meni numore ge bezai ego senua awa, “Na nena mai mamaire gita potana nara te wae. Nera kota, mai mamaira nena nai soero suna unai ine awa te oko inoya.”
Ago senu giro bama meni ina ge bezai ego senua awa, “Tua, awa me tosa. Ata suna opa du itise nena mumuka mai meni wawera osawi ninowera.”
Ago senu giro Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ge ewanana sesesa, are sora bamuyo. Bi meni mai niso doro bamia.” Ago senua awa.
Ago senu bama meni noko tera nuso nana baro bi bamunu mai nuso duro itinua awa ginua.
Yesu meni ana eriro zebu nata Taya itinua awa doro nata Saidon busero zebu zazo Dekapolis awa busero kei awe ou ubu zo zazo Galilaya amira ninua.
Ago itinu ema eni meni ema zo puro muro poti Yesura nana niwa awa. Ema awa dana azai, ge tepo. Ema meni ema awa puro Yesu meni nu kimuro kora waise sero begomo sewa.
Ago wewa giro Yesu meni ema awa puro ema bama doro baro dopero wana sisino emara nana danara potiro pora pisero wana meni emara iwawa kimuro
iri ike niro usika apero emare ego senua awa, “Epata.” (Ge nasokaira, “Dana keyaise.”)
Ago senu dana keenu be peu wenu ge neine senua awa.
Ago wenu giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare tani emira oziga sai azu tona.” Ago sasai nukare weso-waso wero oziga toisowa.
Ema bama eni meni niniro di tainiro titibi awero ego sewa awa, “Nu tani dapikarago neine inowia. Nu wawi ema dana azai meni ge noko ninitinowera, ota ema ge tepo ami ge noko towera.” Ago sewa awa.
Waiko be zore ema bama dainiro meni Yesu nana auniro nena nai tepo itiwa giro nu bua mai nuso zawa senu muwa ego senua awa,
“Na ema bama emo zo inoya. Nera kota, nukare be etorobara namore dai nora nena nai tepo wetia.
Are na nena numorekare kaka potamu tepo iyetamunona, awa nukare susauma ebete ena meri betero duwamunora. Nukare eni so zora-zarako ena mutara.”
Ago senu bua mai meni numore ego sewa awa, “Nakai soe ena nogo nogo wero ema bamera nena nai tamuro potamunonikai?”
Ago sewa senua awa, “Nikare ame moyai nazo ni?” Ago senu sewa awa, “Nakare ame moyai 7.” Ago sewa awa.
Are Yesu meni ema bama zebura arumarise senu arumuwa nu ame moyai 7 awa puro Anuture kokopai asero ame awa eweweniro bua maire potinua awa. Bua mai meni eramare potarise sero potinu puro ema bamere potiwa.
Ota wo kikinaka nusokare eni itiwa giro Yesu meni wo emo Anuture kokopai asero bua maire ego senua awa, “Wo dai ema bamere potiu.” Ago senua awa.
Are potiwa niwa te wenua. Te wenu giro itata poti dara niwa kana 7 te wenua awa.
Erama nena niwa amira namba nusokare awa 4,000.
Niwa amire Yesu meni nukare senu bamuwa. Bamuwa nu bua mai nusore wara witiro zebu zazo Dalimanuta amira bamuwa awa.
Farisayo eni meni Yesu nana muro numore dai ge bawewa awa. Nukare Yesu gaero gamu sero nu tani zo utura putoure wai gamu sewa.
Sewa Yesu meni ge nusokare ginu biawa wenu giro ego senua awa, “Ema zeme zebura nowera ami nogoro tani putoure zo gamu tori? Na ge me tona ewa. Ema zeme zebura nowera ami tani putoure zo oko gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Ago sero nu nukare doro wara noko witiro ou ubu enibara bamunua awa.
Bua mai nuso meni ame kaka pumamu nuweniwa. Ame da gege numorekare dai wara itinua.
Are Yesu meni dana-wena gayai ge numorekare toise ego senua awa, “Nikare uma weu. Farisayora yis ata Herodera yis ami semu nisokare nana nai azu, nikare uma wero baititinoise noiwo.” Ago senua awa.
Nukare ge nuso awa niniro ina-sa wewa awa, “Nakai ame tepo.”
Ago sewa nukare Farisayora gipai ge kota, ame nai awa kotupitinoiwa giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai ame tepo awa nogoro towi? Nikare zeme kaka gamu ni? Gitimunu nisokare omata ine ni?
Nikare giti mokare, ata nikare kaka gamu ni? Nikare danare, ata nikare kaka ninamu ni? Nikare nuwenitawita?
Na ema 5,000 emo ame wana da ewewenisena be amire nikare itatara kana nazo diisewi?” Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Kana 12 diisenakare.”
Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na erama 4,000 emo ame 7 ewewenena nikare itatara kana nazo diisewi?” Ago senu sewa awa, “Kana 7 diisenakare.”
Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Nikare zeme kaka gamu ni?” Ago senua awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore kei awe nata Besaida amira niwa ema eni meni ema giti guma wai zo puro Yesura nana muro Yesu meni nu kimaise sewa awa.
Ago sewa giro Yesu meni ema giti guma wai amira wana ziro puro nata doro baro be pora giti mokara pisero wana giti mokara potiro atata wero senua awa, “Nena zo gosinosita?”
Ago senu nu giti panero ina ego senua awa, “Na erama gosinona. Na nukare gena ni ipu ine inora, ata nukare aita inora.”
Ago senu giro Yesu meni wana nuso giti mokara noko potinu ema awa ua wenu giti moka nuso kokopai wenu nu nena dapikarago giro baitinua awa.
Ago wenu giro Yesu meni nu iyetamu sero ego senua awa, “Ni noko nata emira oko bayase. Ata niso nana bamu.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore dai nata eni zebu zazo Sisaria-Filipai ago itiwa amira bamuwa. Susaumite Yesu meni bua mai atata wero senua awa, “Erama meni na are asinoweri?”
Ago senu ina sewa awa, “Eni meni ego tora: Ni Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema. Ata eni meni awa ego tora: Ni Elia. Ata eni meni awa ego tora: Ni porofete gita noisowa amira zo.”
Ago sewa giro nu nukare atata wero senua awa, “Ina ninekare nitopekare na are asinowewi?” Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Ni Kristo, Soyai Ema nasokare.”
Ago senu Yesu numorekare ge zewai ego senua awa, “Ge naso awa ema zore oko sawe.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni nukare ge tugata wamu sero ego senua awa, “Na Emara Mai meni yaya-buyaya tamamunona. Yuda emara simai ata pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema ami na azu sero na dara betamunona awa. Betana be etorobara tepo wai amire na noko seka wero eramunona.”
Ge awa senu kei awenu giwa. Are Petoro meni nu uzumuro senero ego senua awa, “Ago oko sase.”
Ago senu Yesu meni kapeteniro bua mai nuso eni giro ina Petoro senero ego senua awa, “Satan, ni na doro daiti. Ni ge tosa awa Anutura ge kota, emara ge inoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni bua mai nuso ata ema diti bamu awa zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Zo nu na ama ganamu wero giro ara tamai nuso dapikarago doro duba naire yaya tamaire amira ni pasinai nuso dimuro na ama ganaise.
Nera kota, zo nu zebura nuai nuso soero puro nuamu kotumamunoya amira nuai nuso tepo wamunoya. Ota zo nu na emo wero o Oziga Ewanana emo wero zebura nuai nuso duamunoya ami nuai ewanana tamamunoya.
Zo nu zebura nena kokopai dapikarago awa pupinuamunoya, ata nuai nuso tepo wamunoya, awa nena nemi nuso nana itamunoi?
Ota nuai nuso ewesemaise kotumuro zuma ne potai amire nuai nuso awa ina ewese nuso nana namunoi? Tepo awa.
Ema pasina inoise Anutu soa patitinoise zebura nowera be amire ema zo meni na ata ge naso awa azu samunoya, awa na Emara Mai meni Mama nasora zasimaire angelo saramaire mamunona be amire na ina ema awa azu samunona.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema eni ego dopero itera ami kaka betamu nuara Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira putou kei damu nai gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Waiko be 6 tepo wenu amire Yesu meni Petoroto Yakobore ata Yohane awa gege puro dirumu bamura witiwa Yesura tama meni giti moka nusokarera ewe wenua awa.
Mo nuso meni koa-koa wenua. Mo nuso awa kapa me kapa wai. Ema zo meni mo sewai ago wai ine tepo.
Bua mai nuso meni Eliato Mosere nuto Yesure dai ge toise itiwato awa giwa.
Giro Petoro meni Yesure ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, nakai ego itenakai awa ewanana. Are ninasa nakare komboa etorobara sinanekare — zo niso, zo Mosera, zo Eliara.”
Petoro meni ne sei wero ge awa senua. Nera kota, nukare bua mai meni azu bamubake wewa.
Ago inoiwa bereze zo meni muro nukare gogowenua. Ago wenu ge zo bereze amira mokara ena ego kei awenu niniwa awa, “Awa mai naso. Nu wama naso. Ge nuso niniu.”
Bua mai meni ge awa niniro eya gina-gana wero erama zo kaka gamu wero Yesu gege numorekare dai itinua awa giwa.
Yesu bua mai nusore dirumura ena osero susaumite nu numorekare ge zewai toise ego senua awa, “Nikare tani gewa amira ge oko sawe. Na Emara Mai meni betero erana amire nikare ge awa sawa te wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Are nukare Yesura zewai ge dimuwa. Ata nukare Yesu betero eramunoya amira gera susu gamu sero kotumu-katumu wewa.
Ago inoise nu atata wero sewa awa, “Lo ge gipai ema meni ego towera, ‘Elia gita mai amire Kristo mamunoya.’ Nogoro ago toweri?”
Ago sewa giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Elia nu gita muro nena bamubamu dapikarago korawai amire Kristo mamunoya. Na Emara Maire ge ego gaewa itewia ewa, Nu yaya-buyaya tamamunoya. Nukare nu sero ziamunora awa. Nogoro ge awa gaewa itewi?
Ata na nimorekare tona ewa. Elia munua. Munu giro ema eni meni numore tani tebe-tabe wewa. Ge numore gaewa ago ine te wewa.” Ago senua awa.
Nukare osero muro kei awe bua mai enira nana niro ema diti bamu bua maire dai itiwa giwa. Lo ge gipai ema eni meni bua maire ge bawero itiwa.
Are ema bama meni Yesu tupinu giro mamaniro sumuro baro areniwa awa.
Ago wewa Yesu meni nukare atata wero senua awa, “Nikare ge ne numorekare dai towi?”
Ago senu diti bamu itiwa amira ema zo meni numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, na mai mata naso puro niso nana mena. Nera kota, bi nuso nana toiro itawi nu ge amu itewia.
Mai nago-nago nuawi bi meni nu daramunawi duro pora gutero di wiawi tama aiso nuso zewai-zawai inowia. Are na bua mai niso meni bi tunarise sesena, ata nukare tunai ine tepo.” Ago senua awa.
Ago senu Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “O nikare ema bama tuma diai tepo. Na be nazo nimorekare dai nuamunoni? Na be nazo bua nisokarera tama doinoise nuamunoni? Mai puro naso nana muu.”
Ago senu nukare mai puro nuso nana muwa bi meni Yesu giro mai darauninu duro pora gutinoise aziapinoinu
Yesu meni maira mama atata wero senua awa, “Be nazo yaya awa puro nowi?” Ago senu ina senua awa, “Nu mai morua amire pumunua.
Are bi meni mai betaise sero nu dawi oura o niaora duwitinowia awa. Ata ni yaya awa kora wai ine te wamunoya, awa ni nakare emo zo wero nakare soremu.”
Ago senu giro Yesu meni bera pumuro ego senua awa, “Na yaya awa kora wai ine te wamunoita, asinosita? Ema zo nu tuma diaire ami tani dapikarago wai te inoya.”
Ago senu maira mama meni eya ego senua awa, “Na ni tuma didinona, ata ni na soremasa na ni tuma diro baitane.” Ago senua awa.
Are Yesu meni ema bama witai nuso nana sumuro tupiwa giro nu bi senero ego senua awa, “Ni bi ge amu wai, o dana azai, na nimore ge zewai tona ewa. Ni mai doro nuso nana noko oko toyase.” Ago senua awa.
Ago senu bi meni zawa gaetero mai denu zewai-zawai aziamunu bi nu donu mai betai ine wenua. Ago wenu ema bama saisai meni giro ego sewa awa, “Mai betetia.” Ago sewa,
ata Yesu meni maira wana ziro zinu erinua.
Yesu bua maire dai sora toiro bua mai meni erama zo tepo giro nu atata wero sewa awa, “Nakare bi awa tunamu wetenakare nogoro te kaka wamu weti?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai bi ago ine tunamu sero isa saira bua gege wero tuninowenakai. Tunaira ebata zo tepo.” Ago senua awa.
Nukare ana eriro baro zebu zazo Galilaya awa busewa. Ata Yesu meni nukare susauwa awa ema bama meni gai azu senua.
Azu senua, nera kota, nu bua mai nuso gipinoise ego senua awa, “Nukare na Emara Mai awa puro ema enira nana wanera potara na dara betamunona. Betero be etorobara tepo wai amire eramunona.” Ago senua awa.
Ata nukare ge nusora susu kaka gamu. Noko nukare nu atata wai azu wewa awa.
Nukare susaumite bamu Kapaneam niro sora toiro itiwa amire Yesu meni nukare atata wero senua awa, “Nikare ebete ena ge nogo sesewi?”
Yesu ago atata wenua, ata nukare ge ina kaka samu. Nera kota, nukare ebete ena ego sewa awa, “Nasokai nana zo agai meni bamu inoi?” Ago sewa awa.
Are Yesu meni arumuro bua mai nuso 12 zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni gita wamu samunoya, nu ami ama waise. Nu ema dapikarago amira sou waise.”
Ago sero amire nu mai zo puro poti soe niro mai saniro numorekare ego senua awa,
“Ema zo meni mai zo ego ine na emo kora wamunoya, nu ami na kora wetia ago ine wamunoya. Ema zo na kora wamunoya ami na daba kota, nu na iyetinu osena awa dai kora wetia ago ine wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yohane meni numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, nakare ema zo namorekai dai kaka nuamu ami zazo niso zawa toise bi tuninoi goisenakare. Ata nu nakai kaka ama ganamu inowia, are duaise sisenakare.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Bua duaise awa oko sawe. Nera kota, ema zo meni zazo naso zawa toise tani putoure zo wamunoya ami eya zazo naso puro osai ine te kaka wamu wamunoya.
Ema iwo namorekai kaka wamu awa otao nasokai awa.
Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema zo meni nikare Kristora mai wero nowewa awa giro ou nai nimorekare potamunoya ami ina zuma nuso ewanana pumamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Zo nu mai kikinaka na tuma didinowera amira nana zo uzutai pasina tamai azu, nikare bere-bere omata bamubake zo ema amira nana dube kimeniro ewa surura musunawa dagimai te wamia. Nera kota, ema ami pasina kaka wamure oura dagimuro betamunoya, awa nena peu gege. Ota nu pasina wai amire Anutu meni ina potamunoya, awa nena mou-mau.
Ni wana zo meni pasina wamesaya, wana awa kapase. Ni wana daimatare gege noma ama utura baro nuasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni wana etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya. [
So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.]
Ni te zo meni pasina wamesaya, te awa kapase. Ni te daimatare gege noma ama utura baro nuasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni te etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya awa. [
So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.]
Ni giti moka zo meni pasina wamesaya, giti moka awa gusase. Ni giti moka daimatare gege noma ama Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira nate bayasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni giti moka etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya awa.
So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.
Nakai ewa puro nena naira tetawenakai ewanana inowia awa. Da ago ine yaya niao ine ami erama dapikarago ewanana wawise tetamunoya.
Ima awa nena kokopai. Ata ima berusa wamunoya, awa nakai nogo wanakai bapu nuso ewanana kei awamunoi? Nakai ewa puro nena tame tetawenakai ewanana inowia, da ago ine nikare duba-ozaire nuawa ewanana wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore dai ana eriro bamu zebu zazo Yudaya amira niro noko doro bamu zebu ou Yodan enibara itinua amira niwa ema diti bamu meni nuso nana noko kei awasara nu numorekare utura ge gipinoisonua awa.
Farisayo eni meni nuso nana kei awero nu gaero gamu sero atata wero sewa awa, “Ema meni bama nuso duai ine te inoita?”
Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Mose meni lo ge nimorekare potiro nogo senu?”
Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Mose meni ego senua awa: Ema zo bama nuso duamu sero giro bama duaira pas zo gaero amire bama duaise. Mose meni ago senua awa.” Ago sewa awa.
Ata Yesu numorekare ego senua awa, “Gigai nisokarera Mose meni ge awa nikare emo gaenua.
Ota Anutu meni nena dapikarago tapinoise emare bamere tamunua.
Are ema meni mia mama nuso doro bama nusore dai gamuro baitiro
nuto dubare tamare da wero nuamunorato. Are nuto eto kota, daimata wero nuamunorato.
Anutu meni nuto dara potinu atiwato, are erama meni oko kaparise.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Nukare sora toiro itiwa bua mai nuso meni gera susu gamu sero nu atata wewa.
Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni ara nuso doro bama seka atamunoya, awa nu pasina wamunoya.
Ota bama zo meni iu nuso doro ema zo atamunoya, awa nu pasina wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Ema bama eni meni mai pei-mamai Yesu meni kimaise sero nuso nana puro tupiwa bua mai nuso meni ema bama senewa.
Ata Yesu meni giro dumu wero bua maire ego senua awa, “Nikare mai pei-mamai dou naso nana mare. Ebata nusokare oko gazawe. Ago ine ami Anutura nata amira gegenai.
Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Zo nu tuma diai mai pei-mamaira ine tepo ami Anutura nana nate bayai ine tepo.”
Yesu meni ge ago sero mai kikinaka puro saniro wana poti giti nusokarera niro gawa wenua awa.
Yesu meni bayamu sero ebata tapinoinu ema zo sumuro muro kei awe nuso nana niro koiniro ego senua awa, “O gipai ema ewanana, na nogo wero nuai me ewanana tamamunoni?”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni na ewanana asinoise ewananara susu gosinosita? Anutu imata ewanana.
Ni Anutura lo ge gosinowesa awa: ‘Erama oko dasa betare; Emata bama bewana oko wase; Ni bewana oko wase; Ni ema zo gera potamu opi oko sase; Ema zora nena opi sero oko pumase; Miato mamera ge dimuyo.’ Lo ge ago itia.”
Ago senu nu numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, na seka nasore ge awa dapikarago dipi-tupewena.”
Ago senu Yesu iri niro nu gosinoise zo amuro giro numore ego senua awa, “Ni bua zo dosa itewia awa weyo. Ni bua ei awa wero amire nuai me ewanana tamamunosa. Ni baro nena niso dapikarago potasa ema meni zuma gaero pumara wau moni niso awa ema bogamasare kanowasa pumare. Ago wasa wau niso utura itamunoya awa. Ago wero amire muro na ama ganase.”
Yesu meni ago senu nu tuma gosuna-gasuna wero kotumu-katumu inoise doro bamunua. Awa nera kota, wau moni nuso witai.
Are Yesu meni gina-gana wero bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Erama wau witaire ami Anutura nata amira bayaira bua bamubake wamunora.”
Ago senu bua mai meni ge awa niniro di tainiwa. Ata Yesu meni numorekare noko ego senua awa, “O bua mai naso, Anutura nata amira bayai awa bua bamubake.
Wo kamel meni boma sora toyai awa nena mou awa. Ata ema wau witaire meni Anutura nata amira bayai awa nena mou-mau.”
Ago senu nukare di tainiro ina-sa wewa awa, “Are agai meni utura baro nuai me ewanana tamai te inoi?”
Ago sewa giro Yesu meni iri nusokare nana niro ego senua awa, “Erama meni ago wai ine tepo, ata Anutu meni ago wai te inoya. Nera kota, Anutu meni tani dapikarago wai te inoya.” Ago senua awa.
Ago senu giro Petoro meni numore ego senua awa, “Sana giyo. Nakare neu-nau nasokare dapikarago doro nima ama ganinoise nowenakare.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema zo meni nata nuso, o namisini nuso, o nubabumana nuso, o mia nuso, o mama nuso, o mai awiso nuso, o zebu nus awa nato Oziga Ewananare emo duamunoya, awa
nu ami natare namisinire nubabumanare miamaire mai awisore zebure awa 100 be zeme emire tamamunoya. Ago inuai erama eni meni nu mai naso asero nu waya-waya inuamunora. Ama nu nuai me ewanana awa pumamunoya.
Ota erama gita inora amira eni meni ama wamunora. Erama ama inora ami gita wamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu ema enire Yerusalem bayamu sero ebata tamuro susaumite Yesu nu gita inoinu bua mai nuso meni ama ena kotumu-katumu inoise susauwa ema eni ama muwa ami dai azu inoise bamuwa awa. Are Yesu meni bua mai nuso 12 puro tani ema meni ama numore wamunora amira ge numorekare kerenitinoise ego senua awa,
“Sana niniu. Nakai Yerusalem wititinonakai. Witiro ago kei awero nuanakai amire ema zo meni na Emara Mai awa puro poti pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema amira nana wanera nai nukare na dara betanise sero ema Yudakora nana wanera potamunora.
Ago potara ema Yudako meni na isipitinoise pora namore pisero wamu meni nama pena-pana dero dara betamunona. Betana waiko be etorobara tepo wai amire noko eramunona.” Ago senua awa.
Zebedira mai eto zazo nusoto Yakoboto Yohanere, nuto ami Yesu nana muro ego sewato awa, “Gipai ema, ni namoreto nena zo wasise kotupitinonato.”
Ago sewato giro ina ego senua awa, “Na ne nimoreto wanise kotupitinowito?”
Ago senu nuto sewato awa, “Ni zasimaire itamunosa be amire nato demabe nisora arumuro itamunonato, zo wana mera, zo wana anikara, awa ninasise tonato.”
Ago sewato Yesu meni ina ge bezai numoreto senua awa, “Nito nenara susu kaka gamu wero na atata wetewato. Na ou dokaka zo namunona, awa nito te nanowato? Na ou gutai zo pumamunona, awa nito te pumanowato?”
Ago senu nuto numore ego sewato awa, “Nato te wamunonato.” Ago sewato giro Yesu meni numoreto ego senua awa, “Na ou dokaka zo namunona, awa nito dai namunowato. Na ou gutai zo pamunona, awa nito dai pamunowato.
Ata nito wana naso mera, o wana naso anikara arumuro itamunowato amira ge awa nane sai ine tepo. Anutu meni masi awa ema eni emo sia wenu itewia. Are nukare ami masi amira arumuro itamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Bua mai 10 meni ge awa niniro Yakoboto Yohanere emo duba mou wewa.
Ago wewa giro Yesu meni bua mai 12 zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Zebura ema tua meni ema bama nukare sou warise towera. Noko ema babezinoma meni ema bama puro osero nunekare witai nusokare ine inowera, awa gosinowa.
Ata ninekare meni awa ago ine oko wawe. Nisokare nana zo meni ema bamu nisokare wamu wero giro enira ama-zani wero nuaise.
Ota giti kopi nisokare wamu wero giro enira soumai wero nuaise.
Nera kota, na Emara Mai meni erama na sou warise kota, na natope sou bua inoise betero erama saisai wayara ena soero pumamu muna.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu bua mai nusore kei awe Yeriko niro nata awa duamu sero ema bama saisai amire dai susauwa ema giti guma wai zo zazo nuso Batimea, nu Timeara mai, ami ebata enibara arumuro itinua awa. Nu moni emo begomo toisonua.
Are nu ago itise Yesu Nasaretera ema ego tupia amira ge niniro arero ego senua awa, “O Yesu, ni Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
Ago senu ema saisai meni nu senero sewa awa, “Ni ge do.” Ago sewa, ata nu noko arero senua awa, “O Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
Ago senu giro Yesu meni dopero ego senua awa, “Zawa seu mae.” Ago senu nukare ema giti guma wai awa zawa sero sewa awa, “Azu oko wase. Eriro dope. Nu ni zawa toya.”
Ago sewa nu mo wape nuso kokero eya dopero kei awe Yesura nana ninu
Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Na ne nimore wanise tosi?” Ago senu ema giti guma wai ami ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, giti moka ewanana waise tona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni bamuyo. Tuma diai niso meni ni kora wetia.” Ago senu giti moka nuso ewanana wenu nu Yesu ebete ena ama ganenua awa.
Nukare nata Yerusalem zorage kei awewa. Nata kiaka eto zazo nusoto Betefasito Betanire ago itisowato awa. Ago kei awero dirumu zazo nuso Oliwa awa busuniro Yesu meni bua mai nuso eto gita bayariseto sero numoreto ego senua awa,
