Tani gita Noa wara kaka witamure inoisowa da ago ine inuara na Emara Mai ewesemuro mamunona.
Nukare ou wama bamu kaka mamure nena pupise nise awinoise bama ina-pota wero atitinoise noisowa. Ago inoise noisouta asero noiwa Noa wara witinua awa. Witinu ou wama bamu muro nukare gogowero tepo wenua.
Ema zazo Lati noisonua be amire da ago inoisowa. Nukare nena ninoise nena ina-pota inoise nai bua inoise so wise awinoise noe dowa
Lati meni nata Sodom doro dainitinoinu waiko be da amire awetu niaore utura ena wa boruza meni osago wero ema bama dago awero tepo wenua awa.
Erama meni da ago ine inoise kotumai nusokare poti zebura buara niro nuara na Emara Mai kei damu namunona awa.
Be amire zo nu so nusora ope itamunoya ami neu-nau nuso sora itia awa pumamu oko toyaise. Ota zo nu buye nuamunoya ami oko ewesemuro nate bayaise.
Nikare tani Latira bama amira nana kei awenua* awa kotumuwo.
Ota zo nu nuai nuso zebura awa puro nuamu kotumamunoya ami zebura nuai nuso awa duamunoya. Ata zo nu nuai nuso na emo duamunoya ami nuai ewanana tamamunoya.
Na sana niniu. Pi amire ema eto masi da amira awinuarato na zo pumuro zo duamunona.
Bama eto meni ma ditinoise itarato na zo pumuro zo duamunona. [
Ema eto buye nuarato na zo pumuro zo duamunona.]”
Ago senu nukare ge awa niniro ego sewa awa, “Ema tua, nena awa nana ena kei awamunoi?” Ago sewa Yesu meni ge bezero ego senua awa, “Bua awawi ni oa meni ibosi giro kokounitinowera awa.”
Yesu meni nukare isa saira berea tepo be giti isa toise nuarise sero ge bezai ego ine senua awa,
“Ema zas zo nata zora itisonua ami Anutu ata erama awa azu kaka wamu noisonua.
Nata amira bama kuma zo noisonua ami zas nana eyaya kei awero ego toisonua awa, ‘Iwo naso meni na waya wamu inowia, are ni na soremu.’
Ago sasai zas meni ge nuso kaka ninamu inoe doro ego kotumunua awa, ‘Na Anutu ata erama awa azu oko inowena,
ata bama kuma ewa nu bua bamu namore potitinowia. Inoma eyaya naso nana nuai na berea wamia, na nu kotora ena gera soremane.’”
Tua meni ge bezai awa sero ego senua awa, “Nikare zas waya amira ge awa niniro susu ego giwo.
Anutura sianai dubu nu pi waiko zawa toise nowera nukare awa Anutu meni kotora ena gera soremamunoita? Ota nu nukare eya gera soremamunoita?
Iyo. Na me tona awa. Nu nukare eya gera soremamunoya. Ata na Emara Mai meni noko zebura ewesemuro muro ema tuma diaire eni isa toise nuara tamamunonita?” Ago senua awa.
Ema eni nukare nutopekare gasara ema saramai wasai otao mamai enire gasara waya inoisonua numorekare Yesu meni ge bezai ego senua awa,
“Ema eto nuto isa samu seroto witi Anutura ibu bamura niwato awa. Zo awa Farisayo, ata zo awa takis pumai ema awa.
Farisayo awa dopero itise moka nuso meni isa ego senua awa, ‘O Anutu, na ema eni ine oko aewa. Ago inoise giro na nimore kokopai tona. Nukare awa bewana wai ema ata taniwaya wai ema ata atai sisai ema awa. Ata na nukare ine oko aewa. Noko, na takis pumai ema ego ine oko aewa.
Na pura sero be eto ago nena sienitinowena. Ata nena dapikarago pupinowena awa gatero dubu dawena wana eto wawi zo nimore potitinowena awa.’
Isa ago senua awa, ata takis pumai ema awa asike dopero iri utura nai azu wenua. Nu pasina nuso ginu bamu wenu me nitinoise isa ego senua awa, ‘O Anutu, na pasina ema. Ni na awa diyo.’” Yesu meni uge awa diro ego senua awa,
“Na nimorekare sane. Takis pumai ema awa Anutu meni nu ema saramai asenu nu ewesemuro so nusora bamunua. Ata ema zo awa tepo awa. Nera kota, zo nu tama puro witamunoya, awa Anutu meni nu puro osamunoya. Ata zo nu osero nuamunoya, awa Anutu meni zazo nuso de ike namunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Emare bamere nukare Yesu meni mai pei-mamai gawa waise sero puro nuso nana bamuwa. Ata bua mai nuso meni giwa waya wenu nukare senewa.
Ata Yesu meni mai pei-mamai nuso nana marise sero ego senua awa, “Nikare mai pei-mamai dou naso nana mare. Ebata nusokare oko gazawe. Ago ine ami Anutura nata amira gegenai.
Na ge me memeka nimorekare tona ewa. Zo nu tuma diai mai pei-mamaira ine tepo ami Anutura nana nate bayai ine tepo.” Ago senua awa.
Giti kopi zo meni Yesu atata wero ego senua awa, “O gipai ema ewanana, na nogo wero nuai me ewanana tamamunoni?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ni na ewanana asinoise ewananara susu gosinosita? Anutu imata ewanana.
Ni Anutura lo ge gosinowesa. ‘Emata bama bewana oko wase; Ni erama oko dasa betare; Ni bewana oko wase; Ni ema zo gera potamu opi oko sase; Ni miato mamera ge dimuyo.’ Lo ge ago itia.”
Ago senu giti kopi meni ego senua awa, “Na seka nasore ge awa dapikarago dipi-tupewena.”
Ago senu Yesu meni niniro ego senua awa, “Ni bua zo dosa itewia, awa weyo. Ni baro nena niso dapikarago potasa ema meni zuma gaero pumara wau moni niso awa ema bogamasare kanowasa pumare. Ago wasa wau niso utura itamunoya. Ago wero amire muro na ama ganase.”
Ago senu ema giti kopi ami ge awa nininu duba nuso mou-mau wenua. Nera kota, nu wau bamure.
Ago wenu Yesu meni giro ego senua awa, “Erama wau witaire ami Anutura nata amira bayaira bua bamubake wamunora.
Wo kamel meni boma sora toyai, awa nena mou awa. Ata ema wau witaire meni Anutura natara bayai, awa nena mou-mau awa.”
Ago senu erama ge awa niniro ego sewa awa, “Are agai meni utura baro nuai me ewanana awa tamai te inoi?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nena erama meni wai ine tepo awa Anutu meni wai te inoya.”
Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Sana giyo. Nakare natare neu-nau nasokare dapikarago doro ni ama ganinoise nowenakare.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na me memeka nimorekare tona. Zo nu Anutu imata Tua wero nuaise sero nata nusota bama nusota namisini numisini nusota mama mia nusota mai awiso nuso awa duamunoya, awa
amira Anutu meni zeme zebura ena ina nuso bamubake potamunoya. Noko ama numore nuai me ewanana potamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni bua mai 12 sero puro gita baro numorekare ego senua awa, “Sana niniu. Zeme nakai Yerusalem wititinonakai awa. Are ge gita porofete meni Emara Maire gaewa awa me wamunoya.
Awa erama meni na poti ema Yudako nana wanera namunora. Ago wara na isipitinoise namore waya wise pora pisise awamunora.
Ago wero nukare na wamu meni pena-pana dero amire dara betamunona. Betana waiko be etorobara tepo wai amire noko eramunona.”
Ago senua, ata bua mai meni ge awa niniwa gera susu kaka kei awamu wenua. Nukare ge amira susu kau wero itazaita wewa.
Yeriko nate ena ema giti guma wai zo meni ebata demabera arumuro ema bama moni emo begomo toise itinua. Ago inoise itinu Yesu meni nata amira zorage kei awenua.
Kei awenu ema ami ema bama witai tupiwa amira awi niniro ema eni atata wero senua awa, “Nukare nogo inori?”
Ago senu nukare numore ego sewa awa, “Yesu Nasaretera ema ami tupia.”
Ago sewa giro nu zawa gatero ego senua awa, “Yesu ni Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
Ago senu ema gita aita inoiwa ami nu seninoise nu ge duaise sewa. Ata nu noko zawa bamu gatero senua awa, “O Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
Ago senu Yesu meni niniro ebete dopero numorekare ego senua awa, “Puro naso nana muwo.” Ago senu puro mu zora niwa Yesu meni atata wero senua awa,
“Na ne nimore wanise tosi?” Ago senu nu senua awa, “Tua, na sasa giti moka naso panaise tona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Giti moka niso panaise. Tuma diai nisora ni ewanana wetesa.”
Ago tuaise giti moka nuso panenu nu so noko ginua. Ago wenu ema bama meni tani awa giro Anutu bowi wewa.
Yesu meni Yeriko nate toiro busero semuro bayamu wenua.
Are nata amira ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Zakio. Nu ema takis pupinoisowa amira dia zo. Are nu moni witaire awa.
Are nu Yesura benau giro baitamu kotumunua. Nu ema apunu, are ema bama witai itiwa ami nu gazewa nu Yesu gaira te kaka wamu wenua.
Are nu sumuro gita baro Yesu ego tupiai gamunona asero witi ni zora ninua.
Ago itinu Yesu agewa amira muro iri ike niro numore ego senua awa, “Zakio, ni eya osero mu. Zeme na so nisora witiro itima awamunona.”
Ago senu nu eya osero muro yawa sara inoise Yesu puro bamu so nusora ninua.
Are erama witai ami giwa waya wenu Yesure zuzu toise ego sewa awa, “Nu baro pasina ema zora so amira awaira susawia, atonua!”
Are Zakio nu dopero Tuare ego senua awa, “Tua, sana niniyo. Zeme ara tamai na neu-nau naso puro dubu eto dero zo puro ema bogamasare potamunona. Ota gita ge opi sero ema zora nena daimata bewana pupisenita, awa na ina nuso zoeto-zoeto potamunona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Zeme Anutu meni noko tera ema bama so emira awa pumia. Ema ewa dai nu Abrahamra sibuna.
Na Emara Mai meni ema tara awai ago ine awa kau wero tamuro korawamu muna.” Ago senua awa.
Ago senu niniwa amire susumuro ge bezai zo senua. Nera kota, nu kei Yerusalem nitinoinu nukare ego kotumuwa awa, “Zeme Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya.”
Ago kotupitinoiwa giro nu uge zo diamu ego senua awa, “Ema bamu zo nu zebu zo zora-zarako amira bayai ema tuara putou numore potara ewesemuro mamu senua.
Ago wamu sero bua mai nuso wana eto zawa senu muwa numorekare moni kanowero 200 kina 200 kina potinu pumuwa ego senua awa, ‘Nikare omata emi bua wawa zamai puro nuawa nama ewesemuro mane.’
Ago sero doro susaunu zebu nusora erama meni numore berea wenu giro oziga potiwa puro nu ama ganero bamuwa awa. Baro kei awero ego sewa awa, “Ema ami ema tua nasokare wai azu tonakare.”
Ago sewa ata saineba nukare ema tuara putou numore potiwa pumunua awa. Putou potiwa pumuro ewesemuro muro zebu nusora kei awero bua mai wana eto gita omata potinua nukare awa zawa sarise senu zawa sewa muwa awa. Muwa nu nukare omata bua wewa nazo kei awenu awa gamu senua.
Are bua mai zo meni nuso nana kei awero ego senua awa, ‘Ema tua, 200 kina namore potisesa ami bua wetena 2,000 kina kei awisia.’
Ago senu ema tua meni numore ego senua awa, ‘Ni bua mai ewanana. Ni nena pei-kaka awa ewanana dia wisesa, are ni zeme nata wana eto ago ine dia wasise potamunona.’
Ago senu bua mai zo meni muro ego senua awa, ‘Ema tua, 200 kina namore potisesa ami bua wetena 1,000 kina kei awisia.’
Ago senu ema tua meni numore ego senua awa, ‘Na ni nata wana da awa dia wasise potamunona.’
Are bua mai zo meni muro ego senua awa, ‘Ema tua, 200 kina niso itia ewa. Na gita mo be zora potiro sipunina itewia ewa.
Awa nera kota, na susu niso gosinowena. Ni nena emo duba-duba inoise zewai-zawai inowesa. Nena mai zo meni potawi itewia awa nine pupinowesa; nena mai zo meni urinowia awa nine pupinowesa; are na ni azu inowena.’
Ago senu ema tua meni bua mai amire ego senua awa, ‘Ni bua mai waya me waya awa. Ge nika nisora na ni gera potitinona. Ni susu naso gosinowesa asinosa. Na nena emo duba-duba inoise zewai-zawai inowena. Ago wero nena erama eni meni potawera itewia awa nane pupinowena. Ago wero nena erama eni meni urinowera awa nane pupinowena, ago tosa awa ni?
Agoro ni nogoro moni naso gita kaka poti benkira namu wisesi? Ago wamesa sia, awa na ewesemuro agewa nusore dai pumamena.’
Ago sero nu ema eni zorage dopero itiwa amire ego senua awa, ‘Nikare 200 kina nuso awa soero pumuro potiwo ema 2,000 kina tapisia ami pumae.’
Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, ‘Tua, numa awa 2,000 kina itia!’
Ago sewa ata nu senua awa, ‘Na nimorekare sane. Zo nu nena numore potai awa puro noise ami bua wai giro na eni susumuro numore potamunona. Ata zo nu nena numore potai awa puro noise ami bua kaka wamu wai giro na nena pei-kaka nuso nana itia awa soero pumamunona. Ago wana nu tepo nuamunoya.
Ota iwo naso meni awa nukare na ema tua nusokare wai azu sisera, nukare awa puro mu naso nana giti mokara ena dawa betare.’”
Yesu nu ge awa sero tepo wero Yerusalem witamu gita aita wero bamunua.
Nu dirumu zazo Oliwa awa witiro nata eto zazo nusoto Betfasito Betanire amira zorage kei awero bua mai nuso etore ego sero potinu gita bamuwato awa,
“Nito nata omira baro toiro bamuwoto. Baro wo donki seka bazai zo mui wetera itia awa gamunowato. Gita mai zo meni tame kaka arumamu awa. Nu awa mui besero puro muuto.
Ota besinuawato ema zo meni nito atata wero ‘Nito nogoro donki awa mui besinowita,’ ago sai giro nito ge nuso ina ego sewoto, ‘Tuara bua emira itia.’”
Yesu meni ago sero nuto potinu bamuwato awa. Are nuto baroto nena senua awa te dago tamuwato awa.
Nuto donki seka amira asi besinoiwato wora mamana meni numoreto ego sewa awa, “Nito nogoro donki seka amira asi besinowito?”
Ago sewa nuto ego sewato awa, “Tuara bua emira itia.”
Are nuto donki seka awa puro mu Yesu nana niwato awa. Ago wero nukare tama woi nena nusokare poti donki tame niro amire Yesu ziro soga wewa witi wo tame ninua.
Nu donki tame arumuro susaunu ema bama meni nukare tama woi nena nusokare ami ebete sawa di gita niwa.
Nu dirumu Oliwa osero baro Yerusalem zorage kei awinoinu bua mai dubu nuso bamu ami yawa sara wewa. Nukare tani putoure wasai gosinoisowa awa kotupitinoise arero Anutura zazo de ike nitinoise ego sewa awa,
“Ema tua nasokai Tuara bera tupia nu awa bowi wanekai. Utura tini kapai tepo wetia. Nakai Anutura zazo de ike nanekai!”
Ago sewa Farisayo eni ema bama bamu amira nana soe itiwa ami Yesure ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ema dubu niso meni ni ema tua asinora awa se duare.”
Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Na nimorekare sane. Nukare ge duamunora, awa omata meni ‘ema tua’ asinoise aramunora.” Ago senua awa.
Are Yesu nu mu Yerusalem zorage niro nata bamu awa giro nata emo di senua.
Di sero ego senua awa, “Nikare dai be zeme emire begara ebata gamewa sia, awa te wamia. Ata zeme begara ebata bezinoya. Are nikare oko gamunowa.
Iwo meni nata nisokare zimuro itise aiwa pupinoise uze ape gita niro ami beri waise wamunora. Ago wero nikare poti soe nara nikare bayaira ebata kau wamunowa.
Nukare nata nisokare dara zasai toiro nikare dero tepo-tapo wamunora. Nukare omata zo zora nana tame itamunoya, awa oko awa-diamunora. Tani awa nisokare nana kei awamunoya, nera kota, Anutu meni nikare kora wamu musia amira be awa nikare kaka gamu inowewa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni Anutura ibu bamura toiro ema moni paira bua ibu mokara ena inoiwa giro tunenua.
Nu numorekare ego senu awa, “Ge gayai zo ego itia ewa, Ibu naso awa isa saira ibu itaise. Ata ninekare wetewa ibu awa bewana wai emara bezai masi nusokare ine inoya.” Ago senua awa.
Are waiko be sero nu ibu mokara ena ema bama gipinoisonua. Are pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema ata dia eni dabe nukare nu dara betaise amira ebata tamamu wewa.
Ata ema bama zere dago ami ge nuso ninaira zewai-zawai inoiwa giro nukare ebata zo oko tamuwa.
Are be zore Yesu meni ema bama Anutura ibu mokara ena Tuara ge gipinoise Oziga Ewanana tugata inoinu pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema ata simai eni ami nuso nana muro
numore ego sewa awa, “Ni namorekare se, ni ara bera tani awa inowesi? Agai senu tani awa inowesi?”
Ago sewa nu ge nusokare ina ego senua awa, “Na dai na ge zo nikare atata wamu kotupitinona. Nikare namore seu.
Yohane meni ge ou bua nuso awa ara bera inoisi, emara berata Anutura bera ni?”
Ago senu nukare nutopekare ge ina-sa inoise ego sewa awa, “Nakai ‘Yohanera ou gutai awa utura nena’ asamunonakai, awa nu ego samunoya awa, ‘Are nikare nogoro ge nuso kaka ninamu wisewi?’
Ata ego samunonikaita, ‘Yohanera ou gutai awa emara nena gege awa.’ Ago sanakai erama dapikarago emi omata nasokai nana apamunora. Nera kota, nukare Yohane gasara porofete me inoisia.”
Ago sero nukare Yesure ge ina ego sewa awa, “Yohanera ou gutai awa nana ena kei awenu, awa nakare kaka gamu inonakare.”
Ago sewa Yesu meni ina numorekare ego senua awa, “Ago towa, are na ara bera tani inoweni amira susu nimorekare oko samunona.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ema bamere ge bezai ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni wain bua urenua awa. Urero dia eni potiro nu zebu zora-zarako amira baro borere noisonua awa.
Are wain me paira be munu giro nu bua mai iyetiro baro wain me eni paise senu bamunu dia meni dero tunewa tepo ewesemuro bamunua awa.
Bamunu wainra mama meni bua mai noko zo potinu bamunu dero isipitinoise tunewa tepo ewesemuro bamunua awa.
Bamunu mama meni bua mai zo noko potinu bamunu dewa tama kakapuninu musuniwa.
Ago wewa buara mama meni giro ego senua awa, ‘Nogo wamunoni? Na mai naso nu wama naso awa potana bayamunoya. Bayai nukare nu yaba wamunorita?’
Ago sero iyetinu bamunu dia meni mai awa giro ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, ‘Nu ami noma zebu emira mama wamunoya, are numa danakai betai zebu ewa nasokai wae.’
Ago sero nu musuna-masuna inomite puro baro wain bua doro pua atune ena dewa betenua awa.” Yesu uge awa diro ema atata wero senua awa, “Buara mama meni dia wai emare nogo wamunoi?
Nu muro nukare damunoya. Ago wero dia seka bua nusora potamunoya.” Yesu ago senu nukare niniro ego sewa awa, “Tepo awa. Ago ine oko kei awaise!”
Ago sewa Yesu meni iri nusokare nana niro ego senua awa, “Are ge gayai emira susu nogo iti? So wai ema meni omata zo giwa waya wenu dowa awa. Ata omata ami so urura zasiwi wero itewia.
Zo nu omata amira duwamunoya ami zasamunoya. Ota omata ami ema zora nana tame duwamunoya, awa ema awa dai zasero mumuka gege wamunoya.”
Ago senu lo ge gipai emare pris babezinomare meni ge bezai senua ami nukare pumunu giro waiko da amire nu benai sora potamu sewa, ata nukare ema bama azu wero giro dowa awa.
Are nukare Yesu ziro puro ema tuara nana wanera potamu sero nu uma wewa. Ago inoise nukare ema eni potiwa baro ge ninaira esega wero nu gosinoiwa. Awa nu ge waya zo sai giro nu sanamu sero wewa.
Ago inoise nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, nakare susu niso gosinonakare. Ge niso awa ewanana. Ni ge niso ewanana gege emare bamere towesa. Ni ema eni zazore amira azu oko inowesa. Tepo awa. Nima ema bama Anutura ge amira susu gipero baititinowesa.
Nima nogo kotupitinosi? Nakai Yuda ema meni Roma emara ema tua Sisa amire takis potitinowenakai awa ni gawesa te inowita?”
Ago sewa, ata Yesu meni ge opi nusokare toiwa awa giro numorekare ego senua awa,
“Moni zo gipeu gane. Agoro ititire zazore monira itia ewa awara ni?” Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Awa Sisara.”
Are nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Are nena Sisara asero giro Sisare potiu. Ota nena Anutura asero giro Anuture potiu.”
Ago senu nukare nu ema bama nana benaura sanaira te kaka wamu wenua. Noko ge senua awa niniwa kotumai kaka kei awamu wenu ne seri wero giro dowa.
Ema eni Sadukayora dubu ami Yesu nana muwa awa. Nukare Sadukayo meni ge ego toisowa: Betai nukare noko oko eramunora.
Are nukare nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, Mose meni ge zo namorekai ego gaenua, ‘Ema zo bama atiro noma mai tepo ema awa betamunoya, awa nami nuso meni bama awa noko puro atamunoya. Ago wero nu ami nami nuso emo mai zo pumaise.’
Amira namisini 7 awa nukare gita noisowa awa. Nami zewai awa numa bama atiro noe mai tepo betenua.
Are namba tu meni bama da awa noko atiro noe mai tepo betenu
namba tri meni bama da awa noko atiro noe mai tepo betenu, ago daba wero baro nukare namisini 7 ami bama da awa atiwa, ata nukare mai tepo betewa awa.
Are ama bama dai betenua.
Nukare 7 ami gita bama da awa atiwa. Are be betai meni noko eramunora be amire bama awa ara wamunoi?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Zeme zebura ena ema bama atitinoise nowera.
Ata noma be bamura ena erama eni nuai me ewanana topetarise Anutu meni gai te wamunora, nukare ami betaira ena eriro noko oko ina-ata wamunora.
Anutu meni nukare betaira ena emoko awa-uzenu eriwa, are nukare mai nuso wero noise angelo ine wero itamunora. Nukare noko betai ine tepo awa.
Ota bebetenai meni eramunora, amira ge awa Mose meni dai gipenua. Nu ni payai zo awero kaka tepo wamu wenua amira uge awa gainomite amire ge zo Anutu meni numore senua awa ego gaenua awa, Na Abrahamto Isakare ata Yakobo amira Tua wero itewena.
Anutu nu erama bebetenai asinowenakai awa gawi seka gege inowera. Are nu erama betaira Tua kota, nu erama seka itewera amira Tua wero itewia.”
Nu ago senu lo ge gipai ema eni meni ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ge tosa awa genakare neine inoya.”
Ago sewa, nera kota, Sadukayo meni nu noko atata waira azu wewa awa.
Ata Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Agoro nukare nogoro ego toweri, ‘Yuda emara Soyai Ema zazo Kristo awa nu Dawidira sibuna?’
Ata yere buku nasokai zazo Sam amira awa Dawidi nu nutope ego sero gaenua awa, Tua meni tua nasore ego senua awa, ‘Ni muro wana me nasora arumuro
itasa na iwo dubu niso awa benau nisora potana isimamunosa.’
Dawidi meni ge ago toise Kristore Tua naso asenua. Are Kristo nu nogoro Dawidira sibuna wamunoi?” Ago senua awa.
Ema bama itiwa amira nana benaura Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa,
“Nikare lo ge gipai ema nukare awa uma wewo. Ema bama meni nukare samo darise sero tama woi iboboi wosuniro nowera. Ema bama meni nukare kakame ena giro arenarise yaba inowera. Nukare yere ibura ena ema bama nana benaura arumamu yaba inowera. Nukare ana-bona waira bere masi zazore amira arumamu yaba inowera.
Nukare bama iu betai amira wau awa soero pupinowera. Ago inoise nukare pasina nusokare gogo wero me irora inoise isa iboi-tatana towera. Are nukare ina nusokare mou-mau bamu tamamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu ibu bamura ena itise iri niro ema bama waure meni omata nusokare eni ibura kolekta amira potitinoiwa
gosinoise itinu bama zo iu betai wau tepo bogamasa noisonua ami kei awero toea eto kolektara potinu ginua awa.
Ago wenu Yesu meni giro ego senua awa, “Na ge me memeka nimorekare tona. Bama iu betai bogamasa emi omata potitinoya ami enira awa dainitinoya.
Nera kota, nukare awa omata witai itia ata nukare eni gege Anuture potera. Ata bama ami omata nuso pei-kaka itia awa te potiro tepo wetia. Are nu nena zuma gaero naira zo oko itia.” Ago senua awa.
Ema eni nukare ibu bamura ge sewa. Nukare gita so awa omata ewa-gaewa ami simena-gaena wewa. Noko nena ewa-gaewa Anuture potitinoisowa ami dai simuwa, amira ge sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa,
“Nikare nena bamubamu zeme gosinowa amira susu nuso sane. Ama be zo kei awamunoya amire nukare ibura omata zo oko duara zora nana tame itamunoya. Nukare dero sisero apara osamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ago senu nukare nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, nena tosa awa be nere kei aamunoi? Tani ne gita kei awai amire be awa zora awinoya awa gamunonikare?”
Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare etete nameraya nikare uma wewo. Ema witai muro nikare eteteniro zazo naso toise nutopekare ‘Na ema awa’ asamunora. Noko ‘Be kei awetia’ ago samunora. Ata nikare baro nukare oko ama ganawe.
Nikare ge ego ine ninamunowa: ‘Bogi-zuzuna bamu inora, ota gavmanre iwo inoise nata sisinora.’ Ago sara niniro azu oko wawe. Tani awa gita kei awamunora, ata zebura be eya oko tepo wamunoya.”
Yesu meni ago sero numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema dubu eni nukare bogi-zuzuna ema dubu enire wamunora. Ota ema tua enira dubu ami ema tua enira dubure bogi-zuzuna wamunora.
Duwi babezinoma sumamunora. Agewa eni dora-botiyo babezinoma kei awamunoya. Noko yaya bamubake eni meni erama sero nana witiro tepo wamunoya. Ota noko utura ena tani-butani babezinoma enita noko nena benau seka-seka eni ami kei awara giro erama azu bamu wamunora.
Ota nena awa dapikarago kaka kei awamure nukare nikare saniro yaya bua nimorekare potara tamamunowa. Ago wawa nikare puro poti yere ibura niro ana nikare gera potiro amire benai sora potamunora. Nikare zazo naso puro nowewa, ami emo nukare nikare puro ema tua nana benaurata noko ema tua osesenai enira nana potara ge bua wamunowa.
Ago wamunora be amire nikare Oziga Ewanana puro nowewa amira susu nisokare kerenamunowa.
Nikare ge ei awa kotumai nisokarera potiu zewai wae, ‘Na gera potamunora amire na ge oko sia wamunona.’ Ago toise noiwo.
Nera kota, nane kotumai ewanana nimorekare potamunona. Ago wana iwo nisokare meni ge awa azu sai ine tepo. Noko puro osai ine tepo awa.
Miamai mamanare namisini numisinire didikai ata otao mamai nukare dai nikare iwora wanera potamunora. Ago wara nisokare nana eni awa dara bebetenamunora awa.
Ata ema witai ami nimorekare tini kapai pamunora. Awa nera kota, zazo naso awa nisokare nana itia.
Ota na nikare soremana giti tu nisokare zo oko sokero duamunoya.
Nikare zewai-zawai wero noma nuai me pumamunowa.
Ota ama goroba ema muro Yerusalem zimamu inuara giro ego gamunowa awa: nata bamu dero ziwaira be awa kei awetia.
Be amira ana ema Yudaya zebura itamunora ami azu sumuro bamu dirumura narise. Ema Yerusalem mokara itamunora ami nata doro sumuro bayarise. Ema eni goma atune itamunora ami nate oko toyarise.
Nera kota, be amire Anutu meni ina nuso waya potamunoya. Ago wai ge gaewa awa dapikarago me wamunoya awa.
Oi, bama wasou wai ata bama mai unore. Nukare pena-pana sumai ine tepo, are na nukare emo zo apinona. Nera kota, be amire mou bamubake zebu emira kei awamunoya. Noko Anutura tini gamai bamu ami ema bama dubu emira nana kei awamunoya.
Nukare awa goroba ema meni nukare puro kasiwa meni dara bebetenamunora. Ota noko goroba ema meni ziro beniro puro ema dubu sero amira nana bayara sou bua nusokare wamunora. Ota nata Yerusalem awa ema Yudako meni puro patiro usi-besi inoise nuara be nusokare pesunai amire duamunora.
Tani eni inuara enata, waikora enata, kunara ena kei awamunora. Noko zebura ena ewa bamubake eriro bezinuai erama dubu sero meni niniro azu inoise kotumu-katumu wamunora.
Ota putou utura itewera ami zipamunora. Ago wara erama meni nena zebura ena kei awinoya amira azu inoise kotumai tepo wai dopamunora.
Ago wara na Emara Mai meni putoure zasimai bamure bereze zora osero tupiana ema bama meni gamunora.
Ama nena awa kei awamu zaawinuai giro nikare dapikarago dopero iri ike niwo. Nera kota, be awa Anutu nikare noko tera pumaira be awa zora awetia.”
Yesu ago sero ge bezai zo numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare ni fik ata ni eni amira tani kotumuro susu zo giu.
Bona nusokare gotu gi nusokare zazawera be amire nikare giro, ‘O, waikora be kei awamu inoya,’ ago towewa.
Da ago ine tani kei awamu inoi sesena awa kei awai amire nikare ego sewo, ‘O, Anutu imata Tua wamunoya amira be kei awinoya.’
Na ge me memeka nimorekare sane. Ema bama zeme zebura nora ami kaka betero tepo wamu nuara amire nena awa dapikarago kei awamunoya.
Ama uture zebure sisero tepo wamunorato, ata ge naso meni awa oko sisero tepo wamunoya.
Nikare nena pena-pana nukinoise ou zewai niro dau inoise tamara nena emo duba-duba inoise nuawa be bamu meni nikare eya wawa meni dago wai azu, nikare nitopekare dia wero baitiwo.
Be bamu awa erama zebu sero nowera amira nana kei awamunoya.
Nikare nena bamubamu kei awamunora amira mokara ena zewai wero noma na Emara Mai amira nana benaura dopamu sero duba gitawa tepo eyaya isa toise noiwo.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni waikore ema bama ibu bamura ena gipinoisonua, ata pire nu doro dirumu zo zazo Oliwa amira baro awinoisonua.
Pina atasai ema bama witai meni ibu mokara ena ge sai ninamu nuso nana aunitinoisowa.
Pura bamu zo ame yis tepo ninoisowa amira waiko zo zazo nuso Betai Daininua amira pura awa kei awamu inoinu
pris babezinomare lo ge gipai emare nukare ema bama azu inoise Yesu upene daira ebata kau wewa.
Kau inoiwa Satan meni Yudas nana mokara toinua. Yudas zazo nuso Iskeriot asinoisowa, nu bua mai 12 amira zo.
Nu ami baro pris babezinomare ibu bamura polis amira dia enire dai poti dara niro nu Yesu kereniro wana nusokarera potai parise senua.
Ago senu nukare niniro yawa sara inoise numore omata eni potamu sewa zewai wenua.
Ago sero sewa nu ge nusokare niniro, “Te wetia. Ago wamunona,” asero nu ego kotumunua awa, “Ema bama tepo Yesu imata nuai amire kerenamunona.” Ago kotupitinoise Yesu kereniro wana nusokarera potamu ebata tamaira bua wenua.
Pura ame yis tepo amira be kei awenua. Be amire nukare wo sipsip mai darise sai itisonua.
Are Yesu nu mai eto Petoroto Yohanere iyetitinoise ego senua awa, “Nito baro ame nasokai sia wewoto muro nanekai.”
Ago senu nuto sewato awa, “Ni masi na-amira ena sia waninseto kotupitinosi?”
Ago sewato nu ego senua awa, “Nito niniuto. Nito nata mokara baro ema zo ou au bamu dimuro puro tupima nito ebete ena tamamunoya. Nito ema awa ama ganero baro so toyai giro nito so da amira toiroto
sora mama atata wero ego sewoto, ‘Nakare ata gipai ema ami so moka na-amira ena Betai Daininua amira bona namunonikare?’
Ago sawato nu so moka bamu zo so ike itia awa nimoreto gipamunoya. So moka awa sawa diai au-tewa sia wai itia. Gipai giro ana nito bona naira nena sia wewoto.”
Ago senu nuto baro Yesu meni senua da ago ine tamuroto amire Betai Daininua amira ana-bona naira nena sia wewato awa.
Naira be zora awenu Yesu nu nena naira masi amira baro aposolore dai arumuwa awa.
Ago wero nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Na yaya kaka tamamure bona ei awa nimorekare dai nanise duba wititinowia.
Na me memeka nimorekare sana niniu. Na bona noko oko namunona. Bona me Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira natara ena kei awamunoya awa namunona.”
Ago sero nu akou zo pumuro Anuture kokopai asero amire ego senua awa, “Nikare akou ei awa puro te niwo.
Na nimorekare tona. Zeme emireta ama na ou wain noko oko namunona. Be Anutu imata Tua wamunoya amira be kei awai amire noko namunona.”
Ago sero nu porong pumuro Anuture kokopai asero eweweniro bua mai nusore potitinoise ego senua awa, “Pumuro niu. Ei awa pisi naso. [Na nikare soremaise potitinona. Ama nikare na kotupitinoise ago ninoise noiwo.”
Ago senu nena niro tepo wewa amire akou ou wainire zo pumuro da ago inoise ego senua awa, “Ou wain ei awa orara naso. Orara naso awa nikare emo zozinona.* Orara ami Anuture tairo nuai amira ge seka awa ziai zewai wamunoya.]
Ota gosinowa: ema na poti iwora nana wanera namu inoya ami namore dai nena naira masira itia.
Na Emara Mai meni betai naso Anutu meni senu itewia amira te betamunona, ata ema na kerenamunoya nu awa, oi! ina nuso nogo pumamunoi?”
Nu ago senu giro nukare nutopekare atata ina-wa inoise ego sewa awa, “Nasokai nana ai meni wamunoi?”
Bua mai nukare ge meni ina-da inoise ego sewa awa, “Ai meni gita wai nasokai wamunoi?”
Ago sewa nu senua awa, “Zebura ema tua meni ema bama nukare souwarise towera. Noko ema putou bamure ami ema osai meni nukare bayao ema asarise towera.
Ata nikare ago oko wamunowa. Tepo awa. Ata ema zo nisokare nana ena bamu nisokare wamunoya ami osai ine wero nuaise. Ata giti kopi nisokare meni soumai ine wero nuaise.
Nikare seu. Ai meni bamu inoi — arumuro nena ninoise itia ami bamu inoita dopero nena potitinoya ami bamu inoi? Gosinowa, nena ninoise itia ami bamu inoya. Ata nane meni awa nisokare nana soe noise soumai ine wero nowena.
Na yaya mokara nuawena nikare na kaka duamu namore dai nowewa.
Mama naso meni na nena dapikarago amira dia bamu wero nuanise putou namore potinua. Da ago nane putou nimorekare potitinona awa.
Are na imata Tua wero nuamunona be amire nikare namore dai nena namunonakai. Nikare ema tuara arumai ago ine amira arumuro itise Isreli ema dubu 12 awa awina-dawina wamunowa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni Petoro emo zo amuro ego senua awa, “O Simon, sana nini. Wuit zasero wasawera me ewe puti ewe awinowia ago ine Satan meni nikare puro zasero wasamu sero senu Anutu meni nininua.
Ata na ni emo isa emoko sesena. Awa tuma diai niso besai azu isa sesena. Are ama ni noko ewesemuro otao mamai niso ziasa zewai wamunora.”
Ago senu Petoro meni numore ego senua awa, “Tua, ni benai sorata betaira bayasa na te bayamunona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Petoro, na nimore me tona. Nine pi emire kokara ge kaka samure ‘Na Yesu kaka gamu’ ago sasa be etorobara wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Na gita nikare moni tepo kaita tepo sandol tepo iyetena nikare baro nena kau wisewita?” Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Tepo.”
Ago sewa nu noko numorekare ego senua awa, “Ota zeme meni awa ema zo nu moni itia ami puro nuaise. Ota kaita puro noya ami da ago waise. Ota ema zo nu bogi waira kasiwa tepo giro tama woi nuso potaise zuma gayara nu noko bogi waira kasiwa zo zuma gaero pumae.
Na nimorekare tona ewa: Ge gayai ego itia ami naso nana ena me waise sai itia. Ge awa ego ewa, Nukare nu giwa lo ge dai ema ine wenua.”
Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “O Tua, giyo. Nakai bogi waira kasiwa eto itia ewa.” Ago sewa nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nena amira oko tona. Dou!” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu Oliwa dirumura eyaya susawisonua, are be amire nu nata doro ago bamunua. Bamunu bua mai nukare nu ama ganero bamuwa.
Nu agewa amira kei awero numorekare ego senua awa, “Etetenai nisokare nana kei awamia, isa seu.”
Ago sero nu nukare doro omata saitiro apawenakai baro duwitinowia ago ine baro bawa diro isa toise ego senua awa,
“Mama, ni yaya naso nana tupia awa gazamu wero giro gazeyo. Ota ni ara tamai nasora kota ara tamai nisora weyo.” [
Ago senu utura angelo zo meni osero nu zinu zewai wenua.
Yesu nu duba zazaumunu isa zewai wero toinu wiri nuso orara ine wero muro ose zebura ninua.]
Nu isa tomite eriro bua mai nuso nana baro nukare duba nai tamuro mou wero gitawa inoiwa ginua.
Giro awa-uzero numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro gitawa inowi? Nikare eriu isa sawe. Inuawa nena etetenai ami muro nikare tamamia.”
Yesu nu ge ago toise itinu ema dubu bamu meni nuso nana muwa. Ema zazo nuso Yudas, nu awa bua mai 12 amira nana zo, nu ami gita wenu muwa. Nu Yesu imamu sero nuso nana zorage bamunua.
Ago wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Yudas, ni nogoro na Emara Mai imai niso meni kereniro goroba emare potamu inosi?”
Ago senu bua mai Yesure dai itiwa nukare ami nena kei awamu inoinua awa giro ego sewa awa, “Tua, ni nakare kasiwa meni nukare danisekare kotupitinosita?”
Ago tuarise nusokare nana zo meni eriro pris bamura soumai awa damu wero dana wana mera awa kesenua.
Ago wenu Yesu nu awa giro ego senua awa, “Tani awa zeme do.” Ago sero nu wana poti danara ninu ewanana wenua.
Yesu nu pris babezinomare ibu bamura polis amira dia enire simai enire nukare nu ziro pumamu sero muwa giro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare kasiware dobare puro tupewa, awa goroba ema zo puro benamu mago inowa.
Be giti awa na nimorekare dai ibu bamura ena nuawena nikare ana nogoro na kaka pumamu inowewi? Ata zeme ewa nikare ata mumera mama amira be awa.”
Ge ago senu nu saniro puro bamuwa. Nu puro pris bamubake amira nana so duru bamuwa. Ata Petoro meni awa asike noise nu ama ganenua awa.
Nukare so amira goma mokara toiwa eni meni niao wero amire arumuro awinoise itiwa Petoro nu numorekare dai arumuro itinua awa.
Sou bama diri zo meni Petoro niaora arumuro itinu ginu kei awenua, are nu ua inoise ego senua awa, “Ema ei awa nu Yesure dai nowia.”
Ago senua, ata Petoro meni begi inoise ego senua awa, “Bama, na nu awa kaka gamu.”
Ago senu borere tepo noko zo meni muro nu giro ego senua awa, “Ni dai ema amira bua mai zo.” Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Otao, na tepo awa.”
Ama aua zo tepo wenu amire noko zo meni zewai wero ego senua awa, “Me memeka, ema ei awa numore dai nowia. Nu Galilaya ema zo.”
Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Otao, ge niso tosa awa na kaka gamu awa.” Ago tuaise kokara ge senua.
Ago wenu Tua meni ewesemuro iri Petoro nana ninua. Ago wenu Petoro nu Tua meni ge gita numore ego senua awa kotumunua, “Nine pi emire kokara ge kaka samure gita ‘Na Yesu kaka gamu’ ago sasa be etorobara wamunoya.”
Petoro ge awa kotumuro kei damu niro di bamu senua awa.
Ema Yesu ziro puro itiwa ami nu sero isinoise dewa.
Ago inoise mo sibi meni giti moka nuso gogo wero zasero diro nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni porofete wero giro se, ema ni doinoya amira zazo aweni?”
Ago sero nukare ge waya eni susumuro numore toise nu sero isewa awa.
Pina atinu Yuda emara giti kopire pris babezinomare lo ge gipai emare ami poti dara niro sewa ema Yesu puro aunaira bamuwa amire numore ego sewa awa,
“Ni ge se. Ni Yuda emara Soyai Ema Kristota tepo ni?” asewa nu senua awa, “Na nimorekare samunona, ata nikare gawa oko me wamunoya.
Ota na ge enira nikare atata wamunona, awa nikare ge naso ina oko samunowa.
Ota be bamu bayamunonakai awa na Emara Mai meni Anutu putoure amira nana wana mera arumuro itamunona.”
Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Are ni nitope Anutura Mai ni?” Asewa nu ego senua awa, “Iyo, na ewa. Aware nitopekare towa.”
Ago senu nukare ina-sa wero sewa awa, “Nakai ge ne noko ninamunonikai? Be nuso meni Anutura zazo dena-betena weti ninenakai waya wetia awa.” Ago sewa awa.
Ago sero nukare dapikarago eriro nu puro baro Pilato nana potiwa.
Ana zaawero ge nuso sero ego sewa awa, “Ema ami nakare Yuda ema meni Roma emare bogi wanisekare duba nasokare gainoe doti susu nuso tamuo nu puro tupenakare. Nu nakare ema tua Sisare takis moni potai azu towia. Nu nutope ema tua nasokare zazo Kristo asinowia.”
Ago sewa Pilato meni nu atata wero senua awa, “Ni Yuda emara ema tua ni?” Asenu nu Pilatora ge ina toise ego senua awa, “Iyo. Tosa awa.”
Ago senu giro Pilato noko ewesemuro ema giti kopi ata ema bama diti bamu amire ego senua awa, “Na ge nera sero ema ei awa gera potamunoni? Na pasina nuso zo oko tamena.”
Ago senua, ata nukare ge beina wero ego sewa awa, “Nu nakare Roma emare bogi wanisekare duba gayawi ge nuso ami Yudaya zebu te inowia. Nu Galilaya zebura ena zaawero tupie nata emira ena da ago inoya.”
Ago sewa Pilato meni niniro nukare atata wero senua awa, “Ema ewa nu Galilaya emata?”
Ago atata wenu sewa nu Yesure ego ginua: nu zebu agewa Herode meni dia inoisonua amira mai zo. Be awa Herode nu Yerusalem nate itisonua, are Pilato meni Yesu potinu Herode nana bamunua.
Herode nu Yesu giro yawa sara wenua. Nera kota, nu gita bowi ge nuso niniro nu gamu yaba inoisonua. Nu Yesu meni tani putoure zo wai gamu toise noisonua.
Are Herode nu atata werota wero awenua, ata Yesu meni ge zo numore ina kaka samu wenua.
Ata pris babezinomare lo ge gipai emare nukare ami nusoto nana zorage dopero Yesu gera zewai-zawai potiwa.
Ata Herode soldia nusore nukare nu puro osisinoise sero isimuwa. Isinoise mo owe neinere zo puro numa sawewa pumunu Herode ge senu numa noko puro Pilato nana bamuwa awa.
Gita Herodeto Pilatore nuto iwo ina-wa inoise noisowato, ata waiko be amire awa nuto otao wewato awa.
Pilato nu pris babezinomare diare ema bamere zawa senu muro auniwa
numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare ema ewa puro naso nana muro nu ema bama bogi warise duba gainoya ago sesewa, ata na benau nisokarera ena susu nuso gamu sero atata wetena. Ata sana niniu. Nikare ge nera sero ema ei awa gera potitinowi? Na pasina nuso zo da di oko tamena. Tepo awa.
Herode nu dai ago wero giro noko poti nasokai nana mia. Ata sana niniu. Pasina nuso meni betaira te oko inoya.
Are na sana nu wamu meni dero besara bayamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
Ata tani ego ine inoisowa. Betai Daininua amira pura kei awasai Pilato meni ara tamai nusokarera mai zo besasai nusokare nana susawisonua.
Are Pilato ge ago senu giro ema bama dubu bamu ami te-tetemo arero zawa sero ego sewa awa, “Ema awa deu betai, Barabas besawa kei awero nasokare nana mae.”
Barabas nu gita nata mokara ena bogi zo dia emare inomite mai zo denu betenu giro nu benai sora potiwa itisonua.
Pilato meni Yesu besamu sero numorekare ge noko senua,
ata nukare noko zawa gatero ego sewa awa, “Nu ni pasinaira deu, nu ni pasinaira deu!”
Ago sewa nu noko numorekare senu be etorobara wenua, “Nogoro ago towi? Nu pasina ne wisi? Na pasina nuso waya nu dai betaira te awa kau inona. Are na sana nu wamu meni dero duara bayamunoya.”
Ata nukare ge beina inoise nu ni pasinaira ena betaise arero sewa. Ago sewa zawa gatai nusokare meni Pilatora ge puro osewa.
Ago sewa giro Pilato meni ge nusokare niniro zewai waise senua.
Ota ema gita bogi diare inomite mai denu betenu nu benai sora potiwa itisonua, nu awa ema bama meni pumamu sewa giro Pilato meni besenu bamunua. Ota Yesu meni awa Yuda ema meni nu betaise sewa giro Pilato meni soldia nana wanera potinua awa.
Nukare Yesu puro susaumite ema zo ebete ena tamuwa. Ema awa zazo nuso Simon; nu Sairini natara; nu muro nata bamura toyamu inoinu nukare nu saniro ni pasinai puro nuso nana gape potiwa dimuro Yesu ama ganero bamunua awa.
Ota ema bama dubu bamu nukare nu ama ganero bamuwa. Ota bama witai meni awa nu emo dire-buare inoise duba naire bamuwa.
Ata Yesu nu ewesemuro numorekare ego senua awa, “O Yerusalem bama mamai, nikare na emo oko di sawe. Nikare nitopekare ata mai awiso nisokare emo di seu.
Sana niniu. Ama be zo kei awamunoya be amire nikare duba nitinoise ego samunowa awa, ‘Bama eronaita bama tini azaita bama mai ami kaka gayamu ami* yawa sara warise.’
Be amire ema bama meni dirumure ego samunora awa, ‘Nikare nasokare nana tame duro patawe.’ Noko dirumu pei-mamaire ego samunora awa, ‘Nikare oseu nakare gowawe.’
Nukare na ni busu wai ine awa puro niaora potitinora, are ama nukare nikare ni touwai ine awa puro nogo wamunori?” Ago senua awa.
Nukare pasina mai eto Yesure dai dara betariseto puro bamuwa awa.
Nukare bamuro so zo zazo Giti Kopira Wetu, amira kei awero Yesu ni pasinaira dewa awa. Ago wero pasina mai eto dai dero Yesu nana zo enibara zo enibara ago potiwa dopewato awa.
Ago wewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “O Mama, nukare susu naso kaka gamu inoise tani ewa inoraya ni pasina nusokare do.” Ago senu nukare tama woi nuso awa kanowero pumaira kotumuro ozina laki wewa.
Ema bama nukare dopero ua inoise itiwa awa. Ota dia sai meni awa nukare numa isipitinoise ego sewa awa, “Nu gita ema eni soremuro kora inoisia, are Anutu nu pumunu Tua nasokai Kristo me wero noma giro nu nutope soremaise.”
Soldia ema dai nu isimuwa. Nukare nuso nana zorage muro ou dokaka numore potiro
ego sewa awa, “Ni Yuda emara ema tua noma giro ni nitope soremu.”
Owe zo nuso nana ike ena ego gaewa awa, “Ema ewa Yuda emara ema tua.”
Pasina mai eto nuto dai ikoniwa amira zo meni Yesu isipitinoise ego senua awa, “Ni Soyai Ema nasokare Kristo asinoraya ni nitope sorepitinoise nato dai soremu.”
Ago senu pasina mai zo meni ge awa niniro numa seninoise ego senua awa, “Ni mou nune dipinoya ago ine dipinosa. Ni Anutu azu kaka wamu ni?
Nukare nage detera betinonage awa tani ewanana inora. Nera kota, nage tani waya gita wenage amira te tapinonage awa. Ata ema ami awa nu gita tani waya zo kaka wamu awa.”
Ago sero senua awa, “Yesu, ni ama ema tua wero noma kei awero na kotumuyo.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na ge me nimore tona. Be zeme emire ni namore dai nata ewanana zazo Paradais amira itamunosa.” Ago senua awa.
Are waiko diti 12 klok wenu waikora zasimai tepo wenu mume bamu kei awero zebu te wero itinu 3 klok wenua awa. Ago wenu Anutura ibu bamura mo bamu* kimenai awa keero eto wenua.
<range>
Ago wenu Yesu nu zawa pena-pana gatero ego senua awa, “Mama, ititi naso wana nisora potitinona.” Ago senu ozana nuso tepo wenu betenua awa.
Soldia emara dia meni tani awa giro Anutura zazo de ike nitinoise ego senua awa, “Me memeka, ema awa nu me pasina tepo.”
Ata ema bama dubu bamu muro dubu dero itise nena bamubamu kei awenua awa giro tepo wero nukare duba nitinoise noko ewesemuro bamuwa awa.
Ata Yesura otao mamai ata bama mamai nukare nu ama ganero Galilaya ena muwa ami asikera dopero itise tani kei awenua awa giro tepo wewa awa.
Ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Yosefe. Nu Yuda emara nata zazo Arimatia amira ema. Numa Yuda emara giti kopi dubu amira zo. Numa ema kokopai, tani ewanana gege inoise noisonua.
Otao mamai nuso meni Yesu gera potiro damu sewa nu ginu waya wenu nukare kaka soremamu donua. Ema ami Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira be dia noisonua.
Ema ami Pilato nana bamuro Yesura woi pumamu senua.
Senu nininu woi nuso ni pasinaira ena puro mo kapawai iboi-tatana meni ewero poti omata so zo wamai amira ninua. Gita ema zora woi ago kaka potamu.
Tuwe Sabat purara nena amira korawai be amire omata sora potinu Sabat pura zora awenua.
Ota bama nukare gita Galilaya ena eriro Yesure dai muwa ami Yosefe ama ganero baro bi diti awa giwa awa. Ago inoise Yosefe nu Yesura woi nogo nogo potinu awa dai giwa.
Nukare giro noko ewesemuro so nusokare nana baro ou zamare ata gawi enire sia wewa. Sia wewa Sabat pura kei awenu giro nukare lo ge dipinoise doro itiwa awa.
Sande pina atitinoinu pina-pana gamu nukare ou zamare gita sia wewa awa puro bi ditira bamuwa awa.
Baro ego giwa: Omata bi ditira omata so gazai awa enibara baro itinu giwa.
Are omata sora toiwa, ata nukare Tua Yesura woi kau wewa.
Nukare woi nuso kau wero itazaita inoise itiwa ema eto tama woi nusoto awa kapawero zasimai ami nusokare nana zorage dopero itiwato giwa.
Bama nukare giro azu wero iri dura zebura niro zebu ua wewa. Ata ema eto ami numorekare ego sewato awa, “Nikare nogoro giro ema nuai ewananare nowia awa betaira masira ena kau inowi?
Nu ego oko itia. Nu emoko eria. Nikare ge gita Galilaya itise nimorekare senua awa kotumuro giu.
Nu nimorekare ego senua, ‘Nukare na Emara Mai poti pasina emara nana wanera namunora. Ago wara nukare na ni pasinaira dara betamunona. Betero be etorobara ago tepo wai amire noko seka wero eramunona.’ Nimorekare ago senua.”
Ema eto meni ago sewato giro bama nukare Yesu ge gita senua awa kotumuwa kei awenua.
Are nukare bi diti doro noko ewesemuro baro bua mai nuso 11 ata ema bama enire dai nena kei awenu giwa amira ge uge wewa awa.
Bama ami ge awa aposolore sewa: Maria nu Madalara, ata Yoana, ata Yakobora mia Maria, nukare ata bama eni ami ge awa aposolore sewa.
Ata aposolo meni bamera ge niniwa me amu wenu giro dowa.
Ata Petoro meni awa eriro sumuro baro omata sora ena dupuniro iri du niro mo gege itinu ginua. Ago wero noko ewesemuro sora baro nena kei awenua amira susu kau inoise kotumai saisai wenua.
Ata waiko be da amire nusokare nana ema eto nuto aita wero bamu nata kiaka zo zazo Emeas amira namu bamuwato. Ebata awa Yerusalem doro bamu Emeas nai awa 11 kilomita.
Nuto susawiseto ge nena bamubamu kei awenu giwato amira uge didinoise
susauwato Yesu nu nutope kei nusoto nana niro numoreto dai bamunua.
Nuto numore dai susawise nu giwato oko kei awenua, nera kota, Anutu meni kotumai nusoto siro-siro wenua.
Nu numoreto ego senua awa, “Nito nena nera toise susawewito?” Ago senu nuto doperoto duba nitinoise itiwato.
Ago inoise nusoto nana ema zo zazo nuso Kliopa ami ge ina ego senua awa, “Esewa Yerusalem ena aunitinoise nowera ami tani bamubamu be zeme emire kei awitaya amira oziga awa ninitinora. Ata ni imata ami kaka ninamu inosa, atonua!”
Ago senu Yesu meni nuto atata wero ego senua awa, “Tani nere towito?” Ago senu nuto numore ego sewato awa, “Tani awa Yesu Nasarete natara ema amira nana kei awitaya. Nu porofete, are nu tani putoure inoise ge putoure tugata inoise Anutu nana benaura o ema bama nana benaura nowia.
Ata pris babezinomare ema giti kopi babezinoma nasokaire meni numa iwora wanera potera nukare ge tiro nu dara betaise sero nu ni pasinaira detera betitaya.
Ata nakare ego kotupitinoise nowenakare. Ema ami Isreli ema nakare iwora wanera ena soyamunoya. Awa daba kota, detera beteti nonakai waiko be etorobara inoya.
Ata be zeme emire bama eni dubu nasokarera nunekare ami ge zo sesera nakare niniro kotumai sisinoise itazaita inonakare. Awa nukare pina-pana gamu eriro bi ditira baera.
Ata nukare Yesura woi kaka tamamu wetera. Ago wero nukare noko tera ewesemuro ge ego sesera, ‘Nakare angelo genakare angelo meni nu noko seka wero eria ago seserato.’
Bama meni ago sesera giro ema eni dubu nasokarera ami eriro bi ditira baro bama meni sesera te ago ine gera. Ata numa kaka tamamu wetera.”
Ago sewato giro Yesu meni numoreto ge ego ine senua awa, “O nito kotumai tepo. Ge dapikarago porofete meni gaewa awa nikare nogoro gai me waira timara inowewi?
Soyai Ema Kristo nu gita yaya tamuro amire ama simai zasimaire nuso pumaise sai itia, awa nikare kaka gamu ni?”
Yesu meni ago sero ge nuso Tuara gera gaewa itewia amira susu awa numoreto kerenamu sero ge Mose ata porofete dapikarago meni gaewa amira ana zaawero tutuku-tataka niro senua awa.
Nukare susaumite nata amira kei awamu zorage awewa Yesu nu bayaira wenu
nuto nu soero sewato awa, “Waiko osisinoi pi emoko ziamu inoya. Are ni namoreto dai itamunosa.” Ago sewato giro nu numoreto dai toiro itinua.
Ago itise nukare nena namu inoise nu ame pumuro kokopai Anuture sero ewero numoreto potinua awa.
Nu ago numoreto wenu nuto nu giwato kei awenu giro nu tutamu tepo wenua.
Ago wenu nuto sewato awa, “Nakai ebete aita inonakai nu namorege ge tugata wetia, noko gera susu namorege kerenia, be amire moka nasoge meni kare wietia.”
Nuto ge ago toiseto eriro aita wero noko ewesemuro Yerusalem bamuwato awa. Ago wero nuto bua mai 11 ata otao mamai enire auniro itiwa tamuwato awa.
Tamuwato nukare numoreto ego sewa awa, “Me memeka, Tua noko tera eria. Eriro Simon nana kei aweti gia.”
Ago sewa nuto ebete ena aita inoise tani wewa amira uge didinoise sewato awa, “Nu ame eweti amire nato nu genato kei awetia.” Ago sewato awa.
Nukare ge awa toise itiwa Yesu nu nutope nusokare nana soe damu dopero ego senua awa, “Nikare duba ewananare itiwo.”
Ata nukare titibi awero bita asero azu bamu wewa.
Ata nune numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro itazaita inoise kotumai nisokare sisinowi?
Nikare te-wana naso giu, na natope kei awero itena. Wana nisokare meni na ziro giu. Bi awa tama aiso tepo, ata nane meni awa tama aisore itena ewa.”
Ago sero nu te-wana nuso numorekare gipenua.
Ago wenu nukare nu giro yawa sara bamu wewa, ata noko itazaita wero ge tepo wenu usero itiwa awa. Ago wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nena nai eni ego itita?”
Ago senu giro wo ita gita moewa itinua awa potiwa
nu nusokare nana benaura ena puro ninua.
Nu ge numorekare ego senua awa, “Gita na nimorekare dai noise ego sena awa, ‘Ge namore gita gaewa — Mosera lo ge enata porofetera bukura enata Sam bukura ena gaewa — ge awa dapikarago me wamunoya. Ago sena.”
Ago sero nu kotumai nusokare zinu zazenu nukare be amire Anutura ge gayai amira susu giwa kei awenua awa.
Nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Anutura ge gayai ego ine itia. Na Soyai Ema nisokare Kristo meni yaya tamuro betana waiko be etorobara tepo wai noko bi ditira ena eramunona.
Are nikare Yerusalem ena zaawero oziga naso kerenawa ema bama dubu sero meni niniro zazo naso zawa toise duba kapetenara amire Anutu meni pasina nusokare duamunoya.
Nikare nena bamubamu gosinowewa amira ge kereniro toise noiwo.
Sana niniu: Ozana Mama naso meni nimorekare potamu senua awa iyetana ose nisokare nana namunoya. Ata nikare nata ewa oko duawe. Nikare ego itawa putou utura ena ose nisokare nana nai amire nata doro buara bayamunowa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ago sero nukare puro bamu Betani nate niro nu wana buyaniro nukare gawa wenua.
Nu nukare gawa inuaise Anutu nu pumunu nu nukare doro witi utura ninua.
Ago wenu nukare nu bowi wero yawa sara bamubake inoise noko tera ewesemuro Yerusalem bamuwa.
Ago baro noise nukare be eyaya ibu bamura toiro Anutura zazo de ike nitinoisowa awa.
Bera ge* nu nuai gege noisonua. Bera ge nu Anutura nana giti mokara noisonua. Bera ge nu nutope Anutu.
Nu awa gita susura ena Anuture dai nuai gege noisonua.
Bera ge nu Anutura wana wero nena dapikarago wero tepo wenua. Ota nena kei awenua, awa nu tepo nena zo oko kei awenua.
Ota wero nuai awa nuso nana itisonua. Are nuai awa emara nana zasimuro itisonua awa.
Zasimai* ami mumera zasimunu mume meni zasimai siramu sero kaputinua, ata zasipitinowia awa.
Anutu meni ema zo potinu kei awero noisonua zazo nuso Yohane.
Nu ami zasimaira oziga samu munua. Ema bama dapikarago zasimaira Mama tuma diarise sero Anutu meni senu kei awenua awa.
Yohane nu nutope zasimaira Mama oko aewa. Nu zasimaira oziga gege awa emare samu munua.
Zasimai me nu ema bama dapikarago awa zasimai potitinowia ami be amire zebura kei awero noisonua.
Nu zebura itisonua. Awa gege oko aewa. Zebu dai nune wenua awa. Ago wenua, ata zebura ema bama nukare nu oko giro baitiwa.
Nu zebu nusora kei awenu dubu nuso meni nu giro gago-giago awewa.
Ata eni meni awa nukare Yesu otao wewa, o Yesu tuma diwa ami Anutura mai awiso warise sero Yesu meni zazo nusokare senua awa.
Nukare emara orarara ena oko kei awewa. Nukare emara ara tamaira kota, o emara sai zewai waira kota, nukare Anutura putoura kei awewa awa.
Bera ge nu ema wero kei awero nasokare nana soe noisonua awa. Ago wenu nakare simai zasimaire nuso ginakare. Nu Anutura Mai me, are simai zasimaire nuso nana gege itisonua awa. Nuai me ata dumi yagaba awa duba nusora bera munu puro osenua awa.
Susu nuso Yohane meni poti damu niro zawa sero ego senua awa, “Na nu amire sena awa, ‘Ama tupia ami nu gita wai naso inoya. Nera kota, na kaka kei awamure nu noisonua.’” Yohane meni ago senua awa.
Nakai dapikarago ami dumi yagaba ewa-gaewa awa zamai nusora ena purota puro awinowenakai.
Anutu meni lo ge namorekai potamu sero Mosere potinua awa. Ota Anutu meni dumi yagabare nuai mere awa namorekai potamu sero Yesu Kristore potinu puro munua awa.
Anutu nu ema zo meni oko ginua. Tepo-tapo awa. Are Mai nuso daimata nuso nana zazene itima awinoya ami Mama nuso namorekai kereninua awa.
Yuda ema meni Yerusalem ena pris enire wana soga enire sewa bamuro Yohane atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni ema aweni?”
Ago sewa Yohane nu susu nuso kaka bezamu kereniro ego senua awa, “Na Soyai Ema nisokare Kristo tepo.”
Ago senu nukare noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ina ni aweni? Ni Elia, Kristora awi mai ni?” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na Elia tepo.” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Ni porofete dia inowenakare awa ni?” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Tepo awa.”
Ago senu nukare noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ina ni aweni? Nakare baro ema babezinoma nakare sesera menakare amire nogo samunonikare? Ni nitope nogo towesi?”
Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Porofete Yesaya meni ge zo gaenua awa naso nana ena me inoya. Na oziga sai ema ware gamu-gamura ena noise ego towena awa, ‘Tuara ebata kora weu sonae.’” Ago senua awa.
Ema Yohane nana muwa awa Farisayo meni potiwa muwa awa.
Are nukare nu noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni Soyai Ema nasokare Kristo-ko sia, o Elia-ko sia, o porofete-ko sia ago tosa agiyo. Are ni nogoro ema bama ge ou gutinosi?”
Ago sewa Yohane meni ina ego senua awa, “Na ema ou gege gutinona awa. Ota nisokare nana ena zo kei awamunoya, nikare nu oko gosinowewa.
Nune naso nana atune mamunoya ami ema bamubake awa. Na ema osai me osai ami sandol* nusora asi besai ine te oko inoya.” Ago senua awa.
Susu awa nata zazo Betani, ou Yodan enibara itisonua, amira ana kei awenua. Yohane meni ago noise ana ema bama ge ou gutinoisonua awa.
Pina atinu Yesu meni Yohane nana susaunu aikera ena giro ego senua awa, “Ou giu. Anutura lama. Nune ami zebu serora pasina nusokare dimuro betamunoya.
Na nu amire sena awa, ‘Ama mamunoya nu ami gita wai naso inoya. Nera kota, na kaka kei awamure nu noisonua awa.’ Numa owa.
Na natope nu gita oko gina kei awenua. Ata Isreli ema nikare oziga nuso sana ninawise sero na kei awero ge ou zaawena.”
Yohane meni emare ge ago sero senua awa, “Ozana meni ni guma ine wero utura ena osero nuso nana arumuro iti goisena.
Na gita nu oko gina kei awenua, ata Anutu meni nane ema bama ge ou gutanise sero ego senua awa, ‘Ozana osero nuso nana arumuro itai ema ami ge sai amire ema bama Ozana pumamunora.’
Are nama ana susu nuso giro ego tona ewa: Nu Anutura Mai me awa.” Yohane meni ge ago senua awa.
Pina atinu Yohane ata bua mai nuso eto ami dopero itiwa
Yesu tupinu giro Yohane meni ego senua awa, “Anutura lama owa.”
Ago senu bua mai nuso eto meni ge awa niniro Yesura nana ama bamuwato awa.
Bamuwato Yesu meni kapeteniro giro numoreto ego senua awa, “Nito ne kau inowito?” Ago senu nuto ego sewato awa, “Rabai, (Ge nasokaira, “Gipai ema”) ni so nera itesi?”
Ago sewato Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Muuto gaweto.” Ago senu mai eto meni nu ama ganero sora witiwato awa. Witiroto waiko be da numore dai itiwato. Awa waiko diti osisinoinu 4 klok wenua, are ago wewato awa.
Nuto Yohanera ge niniro Yesu ama ganewato amira zo zazo nuso Anderea. Nu Simon Petorora nami.
Anderea nu nami nuso Simon eya tamuro ego senua awa, “Nato Yuda emara Soyai Ema zazo Mesia awa tamenato.” (Mesia awa Kristo).
Ago sero Yesura nana uzumunu baro kei awewato Yesu meni Petoro giro ego senua awa, “Zazo niso Simon. Ni Yohanera mai. Ata na zazo niso seka Sifas asinona awa.” (Ge nasokaira, “Omata Arama”) Ago senua awa.
Pina atinu Yesu nu Galilaya zebura bayamu sero eriro Filip tamuro ego senua awa, “Ni na ama gane.” Ago senua awa.
Filip nu Besaida natara. Andereato Petorore nuto dai nata da amira.
Are Filip meni Nataniel tamuro ego senua awa, “Ema Mose meni lo gera ge nuso gaenua, o porofete eni meni da ago gaewa, ema awa tamenakare. Nu Yesu, Yosefera mai. Nu Nasarete natara awa.”
Ago senu Nataniel meni ge ina ego senua awa, “Nena kokopai zo meni Nasarete nate ena kei awai te inoita?” Ago senu Filip meni ina ego senua awa, “Ago tosaya mu baro gase.”
Ago senu Nataniel nu Yesu nana bamunu Yesu meni giro ego senua awa, “Ei giu. Ema ei awa Isreli ema me. Ge opi sai duba nusora tepo.”
Ago senu Nataniel meni Yesu atata wero ego senua awa, “Ni nogo nogo wero susu naso gosinosi?” Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Filip meni ni kaka tamamure nane ni ni fik susura itesa gena awa.”
Ago senu Nataniel meni ina ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, ni Anutura Mai me. Ni Isreli emara ema tua.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ni fik susura itesa giro sesena amira gege na tuma didinosua. Tani zeme gesa awa osino gege. Ata ama nena me bamu kei awero bayai gosinuamunosa.”
Ago sero numore ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sane. Nikare utu be zaumai amire Anutura angelo dubu meni na Emara Mai amira nana witiro osero awara gamunowa awa.” Ago senua awa.
Waiko be eto tepo wenu Galilaya zebura nata zo zazo Kena amira ana ema zo bama ataise amira nena asa-waura wewa mu nate ninu Yesura mia dai ago itinua.
Yesu ata bua mai nuso nukare dai aunarise sewa giro baro auniwa awa.
Auniro itise ou wain niwa tepo wenu giro Yesura mia meni numore ego senua awa, “Ou wain nusokare tepo wetia.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na nukare soremamunona asero tosita? Amira be naso kaka mamu.”
Ago senu amire mia nuso meni soumaire ego senua awa, “Yesu meni bua zo wawise sai giro ge nuso dimuwo.” Ago senua awa.
Are so amira au babezinoma 6 ago itiwa awa. Yuda emara nana so sero au ago ine itasai amire nukare ewowora tani inoise nenare tamare sewinoisowa. Au awa babezinoma. Au daimata amira ou pake 10 meni niginoisowa.
Are Yesu meni soumaire ego senua awa, “Nikare ou dumuro aura zozeu bera mare.” Ago senu soumai meni ou dumuro aura zozewa bera muwa awa.
Ago wewa amire nu ego senua awa, “Nikare ou aura awa eni dumuro bonara mamera nana puro bamuu.” Ago senu giro puro bamuwa awa.
Dumuro puro bonara mamera nana susauwa ou wain wenua awa. Puro bamuwa bonara mama meni ninu be zozowa wenua. Ago wenu nu ou wain awa nana munu amira susu nu kaka gamu, ata soumai ou dumuwa ami giwa. Are bonara mama meni ema bama atitinoinua awa zawa senu munu
ego senua awa, “Gita ou wain me potawenakare nawera duba sirawi amire ou wain zuma osai awa ama potawenakare ninowera. Tani nasokare ago itia awa. Ata nine meni awa ou wain me bezero ou wain zuma osai gita potesa nera amire me ama puro potitinosa.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu Kena nate Galilaya zebura ana tani putoure nuso gita zaawero tani awa wenua awa. Ago wero nu putou nuso kereninu bua mai nuso meni tani putoure awa giro nu tuma diwa awa.
Ataira bona tepo wenu Yesu nu Kena nate ena bamu Kapaneam nate namu inoinu mia nuso namisinire ata bua mai nuso nukare dai bamuwa awa. Baro ago be dainiro oko noiwa.
Yuda emara pura zo zazo nuso Betai Daininua amira be zora awenu giro Yesu meni Yerusalem witiro bamunua awa.
Yerusalem nate kei awero Anutura ibu bamu amira baro osi zora ena lama ata bulimakao ata ni guma awa puro baro ina-pota inoise noiwa ginua. Noko eni meni moni tebol tame potiro moni ina-pota inoise itiwa awa.
Ago inoiwa giro Yesu meni asi tenero ami lama bulimakao emare tunenu bamuwa tebol monire ziro kapeteninu moni ose dura ninua awa.
Ago wero ema ni guma puro dopero itiwa amire ego senua awa, “Puro bamuu. Nikare Mama nasora ibura ena nena ina-pota wawa stoa ibu ine wai azu tona.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu ago wenu bua mai nuso meni ge zo gayai itewia awa kotumuwa. Ge awa ego ewa, Ibu niso emi emo tini naso kapinoya.
Are Yuda ema meni Yesu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ai meni sesi tani awa wetesi? Anutu meni sai wamesa sia, awa susu awa poti damu namu sero tani putoure zo we ganekare.”
Ago sewa Yesu meni be nusokarera pumuro ina ego senua awa, “Nikare ibu ei awa ziwawa nane waiko be etorobara gege eya wana noko dopamunoya.”
Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Mamana nasokare meni ibu ei awa zepa 46 ago gapinoe pesuniwa, awa nine waiko be etorobara gege wasa dopaise tosa?” Ago sewa awa.
Ata Yesu nu tama aiso nusora ge awa ibu bamura potiro senua awa.
Are ama noe betero betaira ena seka wero erinu amire bua mai nuso meni ge awa kotumuwa awa. Ago kotupitinoise Anutura ge gayai eni amire ge Yesu meni senua amire awa giwa me wenua.
Yesu meni Yerusalem itise pura amira ana tani putoure eni wenu ema dainiro meni tani putoure awa giro Yesu tuma diwa awa.
Yesu nu nutope emara moka gosinoise susu nuso numorekare kaka kerenamu wenua.
Nu ema zora susu gamu sero ema eni oko atata inoisonua. Nu nutope emara kotumai giro baititinoisonua awa.
Ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Nikodemo. Nu Farisayo zo. Nu Yuda emara gita wai bamubake noisonua awa.
Ema ami pire Yesu nana baro ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, nakare susu niso gosinowenakare. Ni gipai ema me meni Anutura bera mutasa. Ni tani inowesa awa ema zo meni Anutu tepo noise wai ine oko itia.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina numore ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana gi. Zo nu kei awai seka noko kaka kei awamu wamunoya, awa nu Anutura nata gai ine tepo wamunoya.”
Ago senu Nikodemo meni ina ego senua awa, “Zo nu zai wai meni nogo wero amire kei awai seka kei awamunoi? Nu miera tinira noko toyai amire pumai te oko inoi, tanita?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana gi. Zo nu oura ata Ozanara putou amira kaka kei awamu wamunoya, awa nu Anutura nate bayai ine tepo wamunoya.
Zo nu mia meni pumai awa zebura tama aisore dai nowia. Ata zo nu Ozana meni pumai awa Ozanare dai nowia.
Nikare kei awai seka kei awawise sesena awa niniro di oko tainase.
Bisi nu tebe-tabe tupewia, ata ni awi nuso gege ninitinowesa, o susu nana zaawero tupi, o baro nana tepo inoi, awa ni oko gosinowesa. Da ago ine zo nu Ozana meni pumai amira susu ni oko gosinowesa.”
Ago senu Nikodemo meni ina ego senua awa, “Tani awa nogo nogo wero kei awamunoi?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ni Isreli emara gipai ema meni tani awa kaka gamu ni?
Na me memeka sane. Nakare nena kotumai meni gosinowenakare, o nena giti moka meni goisenakare da awa towenakare awa. Ago wawenakare amire nikare ge nasokare dotinowewa awa.
Nena zebura kei awinowia awa sawena gawewa me kaka wamu inowia ami utura nena itia awa sana nogo nogo wero gawa me wamunoi?
Ema zo meni utura witiro noe oko osenua. Na Emara Mai imata utura ena osena. Nane gege imata utura nena gosinona.
Mose meni gita ware ena kapa puro zi kewero puro witiro ni pasinaira ikoninua, da ago ine na Emara Mai ni pasinaira witanise sai itia.
Are na tuma diamunora ami nuai me ewanana awa tamamunora.” Ago senua awa.
Zo nu Anutura Mai tuma diamunoya ami betaise kota, nu nuai me ewanana tamaise sero Anutu meni ema nakai emo duba bayao bamubake inoise Mai nuso daimata potinu osenua awa.
Anutura Mai meni ema gera potaise kota, ema soyaise sero Anutu meni senu osenua awa.
Zo nu Anutura Mai tuma diamunoya ami Anutura kotora ena oko duwamunoya. Zo nu Anutura Mai kaka tuma diamu wamunoya nu ami kotora ena emoko duwia ago ine wamunoya. Nera kota, nu Anutura Mai daimata awa kaka tuma diamu inoya.
Are kotora ena duwai amira susu ego itia awa. Zasimai meni zebura kei awenu ema nukare zasimaira bayai azu sero mumera dago itamu sewa awa. Nukare nuai nusokare waya, are ago wewa awa.
Zo nu pasina inowia ami zasimai azu inowia. Zasimai meni pasina nusora susu kerenai azu inoise nu zasimaira oko kei awamunoya.
Nukare ge me niniro puro nowera ami zasimaira kei awinowera awa. Zo nu zasimaira kei awawi zasimai meni bua nusora susu kerenawi ema bama meni giro bua nusora me awa Anutura putoura kei awinowia, ago samunora awa.
Yesu meni bua mai nuso pumunu Yerusalem doro Yudaya zebu agewara baro noisowa. Ago noise amire ema eni ge ou gutenua.
Yohane dai ema bama ge ou gutinoise itinua. Nu zebu zo zazo Ainon, Selim nate kena ago noise ge ou gutai bua inoisonua. Nu zebu amira ana inoisonua, nera kota, ou bamu ago itisonua. Are ema bama nuso nana kokounasara ge ou gutinoisonua awa.
Yohane nu be amire Herode meni benai sora kaka potamu noise bua awa inoisonua awa.
Are Yuda ema zo ata Yohanera bua mai nukare tama aiso sewaira tani amira ge ina-sa wewa awa.
Ge tomite bua mai meni bamu Yohane nana niro ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ni ou Yodan enibara ena nosa ema zo ni tami susu nuso kereniro namorekare sisesa. Ema ami be zeme emire ema bama ge ou gutinoise iti giro dapikarago nuso nana susawera.”
Ago sewa Yohane meni ego senua awa “Ema zo nu utura Mama meni nena numore kaka potamu wai nu nutope nena awa pai ine tepo.
Na ego toise nimorekare sesena goisewa awa, ‘Na Kristo oko aewa. Anutu meni na potinu nane ebata nuso gita inona.’
Ema zo bama atamunoya bama awa nuso gege awa.* Are nu yawa sara inuai otao nuso meni zorage dopero ge nuso niniro da ago duba kokopai wamunoya. Ema bama meni Yesura nana bamitara, are duba kokopai waira be naso kei awitaya.
Nune witai gege wititinuamunoya. Ata nane meni awa osamunona.” Ago senua awa.
Ike ena osenua ami witai nasokai awa. Zo nu zebura ena kei awai ami zebu emira, are nu zebura ge towia. Ota utura ena osenua ami nakai dapikarago dainiro bamu nasokai wero nowia awa.
Nune utura nena gosinoisonua awa namorekai kereniro towia, ata ema meni ge nuso dotinowera.
Zo nu Maira ge niniro puro poti dube niro nowia ami ago inoise “Anutu ge me towia,” asinowia.
Ema Anutu meni senu osenua ami Anutura ge towia. Nera kota, Anutu meni Ozana zere dago numore potai gege potitinowia.
Mama nu Mai nuso ara tapinoise nena bamubamu dapikarago Maira nana wanera potinu itewera.
Zo nu Anutura Mai tuma didinowia ami nuai me ewanana puro nowia. Ata zo nu Anutura Mai amira ge dero nowia ami nuai me ewanana oko gamunoya. Ema ago amira nana Anutura tini kapai meni itai gege itamunoya.
Farisayo nukare Yesura oziga ego niniwa awa, “Yesu nu ema dainiro puro ge ou gutinoya, are bua mai dubu nuso meni Yohanera bua mai dubu awa dainitinoya.” Ago niniwa awa.
Ata Yesu nu nutope ema zo ge ou kaka gutamu. Bua mai nuso meni ema bama ge ou gutinoisowa awa.
Are Farisayo ge ago ine niniwa giro Yesu meni Yudaya zebu doro ewesemuro Galilaya zebura bamunua awa.
Ebata awa Samaria zebu busero susawisonua.
Yesu meni zebu awa busero susaumite Samaria nata zo zazo Saika amira kei awenua awa. Nata awa Yakobo meni mai nuso Yosefere zebu agewa potinua amira zorage itisonua awa.
Ota zebu da amira Yakobora ou ura wamai zo itisonua. Are Yesu nu ago kei awero waiko soe dopenua, are putou tepo wenu giro ou ura wamai amira zorage arumunua awa.
Arumuro itinu Samaria bama zo ou dumamu sero munua. Munu Yesu meni giro numore ego senua awa, “Ou poti nane.” Ago senua awa.
Bua mai nuso nukare ma pumamu sero nate witiwa nu imata itimite bamere oura ge senua awa.
Senu bama meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni Yuda ema meni nogoro ou emo Samaria bama namore ge tosi?” Ago senua, nera kota, Yuda emare Samaria emare nukare kapero noisowa, are bama meni ge awa senua.
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni Anutu dumi pai nusora susure, o ou emo tona amira susure gamesa, awa ni ou emo namore begomo sasa na nuai me ewanana amira ou awa nimore potamena.”
Ago senu bama meni ina ego senua awa, “Ou ura awa tura me tura. Agoro ni kopi ou dumai tepo. Are nuai me ewananara ou awa nana pamunosi?
Ewowo nasokai Yakobo nu ou ura ei awa wamunua. Ago wenu nu ata mai awiso nuso ata lama bulimakao nukare dapikarago ami ou ei awa ninoise noisowa. Nu ou ura ei awa namorekai dirieninua. Ata ni Yakobo dainitinosa, ago tosita?”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ou ei awa nawewa noko ou uza eya inowia.
Ata ou nane potamunona awa zo meni nai ou uza noko oko wamunoya. Nane ou awa ema zore potana duba nusora ena ou kupi-kupi inuamunoya. Ago inuai ema ami nuai me ewanana puro nuamunoya.”
Ago senu bama meni ego senua awa, “Ema, ni ou awa potasa niro ou uza kaka wamu nuane. Ago wero ou emo eyaya ego tupewena awa duane.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni baro ema niso puro maweto.”
Ago senu bama meni ina ego senua awa, “Na ema tepo.” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni ema niso tepo awa me tosa awa.
Ni ema wana da ago atiro doro awinowesa. Agoro be zeme ewa ni ema zore nosa, ata nu ema niso tepo, are ni ge me tosa.”
Ago senu bama meni ego senua awa, “Ema, na zeme susu niso gosinona. Ni porofete me.
Are se gane. Zezewenai nasokare nukare dirumu emira* ena auniro Anutura yere gapise ge ninise awinoisowa. Ata Yuda ema ninekare meni awa Yerusalem nate ena Anutu isa sise yere gapise awinoise nuanisekai sai itia ago towewa.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Bama, na ge sana gasa me wae. Be zo zorage awinoya. Be awa kei awai amire nikare Mama isare yerere meni bowi wamu sero dirumu emirata Yerusalem nate ena oko wamunowa.
Ninekare awa kaka giro baitamu inoise yere isare towewa. Nanekare awa giro baititinoise yere isare towenakare. Nera kota, korawai ewanana wai awa Yudara nana ena gita kei awaise sai itia.
Be zo mamunoya be amire Anutura ema dubu me meni nu bowi wamu sero ititire tani mere meni wamunora. Mama nu ema ago ine ami nu bowi warise yaba inowia.
Anutu nu tama aiso kota, nu ititi. Are nikare nu bowi wamu sero tama meni kota, ititire tani mere meni nu bowi inoise noiwo.”
Ago senu bama meni ina ego senua awa, “Na gosinona. Mesia zazo nuso zo Kristo ami mamunoya. Nu muro nena dapikarago poti damu namunoya.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ge tosa awa zo tepo, ata na ewa nimore dai ge tona. Ge awa nama awa.”
Ge ago toinu bua mai nuso kei awewa. Kei awero bamere dai ge toiwato awa giro di tainiwa awa. Ota nena ne emo bamere ge toi, o nogoro toi, ago sero atata waira awa giwa te kaka wamu wenu giro dowa awa.
Ago wewa bama nu kopi ou dumai nuso doro sumuro bamu nate niro emare senua awa,
“Nikare muu. Baro ema zo gawe. Nune nuai nasora susu dapikarago namore kerenia. Nu Kristo, tanita?”
Ago senu ema dago Yesu gamu bamuwa awa.
Nukare Yesura nana susauwa bua mai nuso meni Yesure ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ni nena ni.”
Ago sewa ina ego senua awa, “Ma naso itia. Awa nikare oko gosinowa.”
Ago senu bua mai nuso meni nutopekare ina-sa wero sewa awa, “Ai meni ma puro mi?”
Ago sewa giro nu ego senua awa, “Nu na potinu muna amira ge dimuro bua nuso wero susauma pesunamunona ami ma naso inoya awa.
Nikare nitopekare ego towewa awa, ‘Inua zoeto-zoeto ago tepo wai amire ma me wamunoya.’ Are nane sana niniu. Nikare irina-arina wero bua giu. Ma pumaira be* kei awero itia.
Ema zo nu ma puro poti dara nai bua inoya ami zuma pupinoya. Nu ma nuai me ewananara gegenai awa pumu sora nitinoya. Are ema ma urai ema ata ema ma pumai ema nuto ami eroma yawa sara wamunorato.
Are ge ego towenakai ami ena me inoya, ‘Zo meni urai bua inowia, ota zo meni pumai bua inowia.’
Ma nikare kaka uramu wisewa amira me awa pumu sora nawise sesena bayamunowa. Bua awa eni meni wisera amira me ninekare pumamunowa.” Ago senua awa.
Are Samaria ema bama dainiro meni bamera ge niniro Yesu tuma diwa awa. Ago wewa, nera kota, bama meni nuai nusora susu awa dapikarago Yesu meni kereninu giro ema bama susure senu niniwa.
Are nukare Yesura nana muro Yesu numorekare dai nuaise uzumuro puro bamu nate namu sewa giro Yesu meni numorekare dai waiko be eto ago noinua awa.
Ago noise ge toise noinu ema dainiro meni ge nuso niniro nu tuma diwa.
Ago wero bamere ego sewa awa, “Gita nakare uge niso niniro nu tuma dienakare. Ota zeme ei awa nakare be so nusora ena ge niniro ego tonakare: Nu zebu serora ema bama amira Korawai Ema me.” Ago sewa awa.
Yesu nu Samaria emare dai be eto itimite nukare doro Galilaya zebura bamunua awa.
Yesu nu ge gita ego senua awa, “Porofete nukare nata nusokarera kei awero ema zazore oko inowera.”
Are Yesu meni Galilaya zebura baro kei awenu Galilaya ema nu giro areniro yawa sara wewa. Awa nera kota, be zore nukare bamu Yerusalem niro Yuda emara pura amira ana bua Yesu meni wenua awa giwa.
Yesu meni Galilaya zebura kei awero Kena nate bamunua. Nata amira ana nu gita ge senu ou meni wain wenua. Ago bamunu Kapaneam nate dia ema bamu zo noisonua amira mai yaya mou-mau puro itinua.
Are “Yesu nu Yudaya zebu doro ewesemuro mu Galilaya zebura niro noya,” ago sewa giro dia ema ami bamu Kena nate niro Yesura nana bamunua awa. Baro mai nuso betamu sero inoinu giro Yesu uzumuro puro sora baro mai nuso kora waise senua.
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Nikare tani putoure eni ata bua bamu eni awa kaka gamu wamunowa, awa nikare na oko tuma diamunowa.”
Ago senu dia ema meni ego senua awa, “O Tua, mai naso betai azu, eya bayasise tona.”
Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni tepo bamu. Mai niso ewanana wetia awa.” Ago senu dia ema nu Yesura ge nininu me wenu giro bamunua awa.
Ewesemuro susaunu soumai nuso eni meni oziga puro muro nu tamuro ego sewa awa, “Mai niso ewanana wero noya.”
Ago sewa giro mai ewanana wenua amira waiko be awa gamu sero atata wenu sewa awa, “Awenakai amire waiko soe dopero iti amire tama mena-mana nuso tepo wataya.”
Ago sewa dia ema meni susu ego ginua awa: “Be amire Yesu meni na ewesemanise sero ego sasaya, ‘Mai niso ewanana wetia.’” Are dia ema meni susu awa giro nu arere awisore Yesu tuma diwa awa.
Yesu Yudaya zebura ena ewesemuro Galilaya zebura kei awero tani awa wenua, awa tani putoure namba tu Galilaya zebura ena wenua awa.
Yuda emara pura zo amira be munu giro Yesu witiro bamu Yerusalem ninua awa.
Goma zo nata Yerusalem zimai amira toyai be zo zazo nuso Lama Toyai Be. Toyai be amira ou butu zo itisonua zazo nuso Yuda gera Betesida. Ou amira bera bisi paira so wana da ago itisowa.
So amira ema yayare witai ami duro itisowa. Ema eni giti guma wai, o eni zabura wai, o eni orara touwai dainiro meni ago itisowa. [Nukare ou pasi wai gamu dia itisowa.
Ago itasara be enire Tuara angelo zo meni osero ou butu dasai pasi wasai yaya emara nana zo meni gita gita wero ose oura niro dagimasai yaya nuso eya tepo wasai ewanana inoisonua awa.]
Are ema zo nu zabura wero noe donu zepa 38 wenua ami ago itinua.
Yesu meni ema awa giro yaya nuso borere-barere itisonua awa giro numore ego senua awa, “Ni ewanana wamu kotupitinosita?”
Ago senu ema zebura wai ami ina ego senua awa, “O ema, ou pasi wai amire ai meni na wana ziro pumai osero ou awa dagimuro ewanana wamunoni? Eni meni na dainiro ose oura nawera giro na itewena.”
Ago senu Yesu meni ina numore ego senua awa, “Ni eriro sawa niso puro aita we.”
Ago senu ema zebura waira tama kokopai wenu nu eriro sawa nuso pumuro aita wenua awa. Waiko be awa Yuda emara Sabat pura itiwa awa.
Are Yuda ema meni ema ewanana wenua amire ego sewa awa, “Pura be emira sai zewai wai ge nasokai itia awa ni dainitinoise sawa masi niso puro nosa, atonua.”
Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Na kora wetia ami ego sesia awa, ‘Sawa niso puro aita we.’”
Ago senu sewa awa, “Sawa niso puro aita we, ago ema zazo ai meni sesi?”
Ago sewa ema senu kokopai wenua ami Yesura zazo kau wenua. Nera kota, Yesu nu ema dubu dopero itiwa amira nana soe ena saitiro bamunua awa.
Ama Yesu meni ema awa Anutura ibu bamura ena tamuro ego senua awa, “Ni tama niso ewanana watasa, ata mou-mau zo niso nana kei awai azu, pasina doro noiyo.”
Ago senu nu Yesu giro baitiro bamuro Yuda emare ego senua awa, “Ema na kora wetia awa zazo nuso Yesu.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu Sabat pura amire bua ago ine wenua, are Yuda ema meni giro nu iwo wewa awa.
Ago wewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Mama naso nu bua wai gege inoise nowia, are na da ago ine bua inona.” Ago senua awa.
Yesu nu Sabat pura sisenua, ota Anutu nu Mama nuka nuso asinoise nu Anutu ine awa senua, awa Yuda ema meni giwa waya wenu giro nukare Yesu damu sero ebata tamamu wewa.
Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana niniu. Na Mai meni duba nasora bua oko inowena. Mama meni wawi giro inowena. Mama meni wawi giro na Mai meni da ago inowena.
Mama nu Mai nuso giro yaba dasiga inowia, are bua inowia awa te gipinowia. Ota bua ei awa gege kota, bua witai eni itera awa dai Maire gipai giro nikare titibi awero di tainamunowa awa.
Mama nu betai ema awa-uzawi seka inowera, da ago ine na Mai meni ara tamai nasora zota zo awa-uzana seka wamunora awa.
Mama nu emara zas oko inowia. Bua awa dapikarago Maira nana wanera potinua awa.
Are ema nukare Mama bowi inowera, da ago ine Mai bowi warise. Zo nu Mai bowi kaka wamu wamunoya ami Mama na iyetinua awa dai bowi kaka wamu ago ine inoya.
Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo meni ge naso ninitinoise Mama naso na iyetinua amira ge gi me inoya ami nuai me ewanana zeme emire puro noya. Nu kotora ena oko duwamunoya. Nu zewai wero betai doro nuaira kei awero nowia.
Na me memeka sana niniu. Ema bama nowera ami bebetenai ine. Be zo mamunoya — ota kei awero itia — be amire nukare Anutura Mai amira ge awi ninamunora. Eni meni ge niniro baitiro seka wero nuamunora awa.
Mama nu nuaira Mama, are nu Mai nusore da ago nuai dirieninu na nuaira Mama wero nowena.
Na Mai, na Emara Mai. Are Mama naso meni emara koto amira zas bua awa na Mamera bera wanise sero putou namore potinua.
Nikare ge awa niniro oko di tainawe. Nera kota, be zo potai itia awa mai amire bi ditira awinowera ami zawa naso ninamunora.
Ago niniro ewanana noisowa ami eriro nuai me ewanana tamamunora. Ota waya wero noisowa ami meni awa eriro koto wero kotora ena duwamunora awa.
Na duba nasora bua zo wai ine oko itia. Na ge Mama nasora bera ena ninitinowena da awa inoise kotora zas inowena awa. Ago inoise kotora zas bua wana te wamunoya. Nera kota, na ara tamai nasora kota, nu senu osena amira ara tamaira wamu inowena awa.
Na natope susu naso sana te oko wamunoya.
Susu naso awa zo meni kerenitinowia. Nu susu naso kerenitinoise ge me toya awa gosinona.
Nikare sesewa bua mai nisokare meni Yohanera nana baro atata wetera nu ge me kereniro sisia awa.
Ema zo meni susu naso kerenaise awa oko yaba inona. Nikare susu naso ninawa Anutu meni nikare soero pumaise sero nimorekare sesena awa.
Yohane nu zasimai bamubake ine wero noise nikare zasimunua. Zasimai nuso giro yawa sara apunu-kaka gege inoise noisewa awa.
Ata susu naso kerenitinowia ami nu Yohane ine oko aewa. Nu witai. Na bua Mama meni wanise senua awa inowena. Bua ami susu naso ego ine kerenitinowia: Mama meni senu osena awa.
Are Mama na senu osena ami susu naso kerenitinowia. Nikare be nusora ge kaka ninamu inowewa. Nikare giti moka nuso kaka gamu inowewa.
Ge nuso duba nisokarera oko itia. Nera kota, nikare Mama na senu osena amira ge ninawewa me kaka wamu inowia.
Nikare ego towewa awa, ‘Anutura ge gayai ami nuai me ewanana namorekai tamamunoya.’ Ago toise nuai me ewanana tamamu sero ge gayai azipitinowewa. Ge gayai ami susu naso kerenitinowia,
ata nikare na nuai me ewanana nimorekare potanise sero namore dai dara tayai azu towewa.
Ema meni na bowi warise oko towena.
Na susu nisokare gosinowena. Duba nisokare meni awa Anutu Mama nasora nana oko itewia.
Na Mama nasora ge dimuro nisokare nana osena awa, ata nikare ge naso doro na oko otao inowewa. Noma ema zo kotumai nusora kei nisokare nana nai amire numore dai otao wamunowa.
Nikare nitopekare bowi ina-wa inoise nowewa. Ota Anutu imata nikare bowi waise ago kaka samu inowewa ami nogo wero na tuma diamunowi?
Nikare namore ego oko sawe, ‘Nune nakai gera potai ge bua wamunonakai.’ Namore ago oko sawe. Nikare Mose tuma diro nowewa, are Mose meni nikare gera potamunoya.
Mose meni ge gaenua, awa namore gaenua awa. Nikare ge nuso ninawa me wamia, awa nikare ge naso dai ninawa me wamia.
Ota nikare Mosera ge gayai awa niniwa me kaka wamu wenu giro dowa, are nogo nogo wero ge naso ninawa me wamunoi?” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
Yesu meni ge awa senu tepo wenu Galilaya ou ubu semuro bamu enibara ninua awa. Ou ubu amira zazo zo Taibirias asinowera.
Semuro bamunu nu ema bama yayare kora wasai ewanana inoisowa awa eni meni gosinoisowa, are ema diti bamu meni nu ama ganewa awa.
Ago wewa Yesu meni bua mai nuso pumuro witi dirumura niro arumuro itiwa awa.
Be amira ana Yuda emara pura zo zazo nuso Betai Daininua amira be zora awenua awa.
Are Yesu meni ema dubu bamu nuso nana tupiwa giro Filip atata wero ego senua awa, “Ma nana ena puro ema dubu bamu amire potanakai nara te wamunoi?”
Yesu nu bua zo wamu kotupitinoinua, ata nu Filip gaero gamu atata wero senua awa.
Ago senu Filip meni ego senua awa, “500 kina meni ma pumuro potanakai nara te kaka wamu wamunoi, tanita.”
Ago senu bua mai nusora nana zo Anderea, nu Simon Petorora nami, ami ego senua awa,
“Mai zo meni ma wana dare ou wo etore puro noya. Ata ema dubu bamu, are te oko wamunoi, tanita.”
